title: Real Surgery Doctor Game-Free Operation Games 2019
description:
New Surgery Doctor Game-Free Operation Games 2019
Being a heart surgeon to perform a open heart surgery in hospital.
Gain health and fitness with a simple open heart surgery. With a crazy game play this android game has a real heart transplant and ultimate operations. Some heart attack patients visit the doctor hospital and some are brought in a hospital ambulance. The hospital has an own ambulance. The ambulance has reached the hospital in time otherwise the patient will die. The new patient comes to get heart surgery operation done from cardiologist surgeon. The ambulance doctor has noted down the disease of the heart of the patient; when they were on his way to a hospital. Emergency admits the patient in the hospital. In checkup ward a specialized doctor will make sure whether his blood pressure is at required state, his breathing rate is normal and heart beat is normal or not by using heartbeat monitor. Heart patients have a heart surgery risk. 
Get ready to perform the mega heart surgery in this heart transplant game. These awesome doctor games with real doctor tools and crazy surgeon treatments have so much fun. Surgeon doctor will tell that whether he has a fever. Before starting any kind of heart operation; doctors should make sure that whether the patient is not suffering from any other disease. Which causes the blood flow in a constant manner is stopped. Get your tools ready for this surgeon treatment game. This patient is suffering from a chest disease like a heart attack. This problem can affect his arms, fingers and leg movements if the heart does not pump blood properly. You will perform a duty of surgeon doctor in this heart surgeon game. The doctor should check all the medical records of heart attack patient. 
Check their temperature and don‚Äôt forget to measure the sugar level. After fever and other small tests, you will go for the heart surgery. Take the patient in the hospital operation theater to heart surgery. To avoid any other damage, now do the open chest surgery properly. The doctor has come and operation has started. First of all, put the oxygen mask on his mouth. Then you will cut and open the skin from the chest of the patient.  Avoid damaging the rib cage of the patient. Then check the heart rate monitor of heart patient in this game. The hospital nurse will provide you all the medical tools necessary to perform the open heart surgery. The heart patient veins and arteries might have been blocked. Prevent him; getting into the frozen state. 
Open heart surgery is a doctor game for all heart patients in the hospital environment. In-app like remove ads and unlock new patients is included in this heart surgeon emergency doctor game. Keep checking his kidney, liver, lungs, stomach and all parts of the body. The doctor should check the whole parts of the body especially lungs, kidney and stomach. Ecg will inform that which parts of the heart are affected and require immediate attention. Heart problems cause a lot of problems like weight loss and change in body shape. When the heart patients check in the ER emergency; the doctor should check the patient properly. Each level is difficult than the previous level. After completing the first level you will permute to next deadly level. Download and play this doctor surgeon heart surgery game. Good luck!

open heart surgery doctor game Features:
Fun treatments and real surgeries
Amazing graphics and crazy game play
Use all medical tools
Check the temperature with thermometer
Zoom camera view
Easy to play
It‚Äôs totally free to play.

So get it now from Google play store for your android devices.
Quickly download this interesting 2019 games.

title: Operate Now: Hospital
description:
Operate Now is the most realistic surgery simulation game. Operate patients like a surgeon and build your own hospital from scratch. 

Fan of surgery simulator and life simulation? Perform realistic surgeries on patients! Start to build and manage your own hospital and operate and rescue patients.
Hurry, Doctor! You‚Äôre needed at the hospital, on the double! Your dedicated medical team is depending on you to manage them, improve their facilities, and even perform important surgeries that could determine whether a patient lives or dies!

These are just a few of the thrilling things you‚Äôll get to experience in Operate Now: Hospital, which has been downloaded over 20 million times by players all around the globe. They love the intense surgeries and exciting melodramas that have helped make it one of the most realistic and popular medical simulation games of all time. Are you ready to take on all the challenges that are waiting for you while you attempt to build a world-renowned medical center? 

HERE‚ÄôS THE FEATURES, DOCTOR !

‚òÖ Build, upgrade, and continually improve multiple hospitals and their facilities.
‚òÖ Fan of surgery ? Operate your patients!
‚òÖ Monitor your staff, hospitals, and more on the world map.
‚òÖ Help your patients by performing incredibly realistic surgeries.
‚òÖ Exchange duplicate staff members with the new CV feature.
‚òÖ Keep your progress up-to-date with the new Facebook save feature. 
‚òÖ Speed things up with the builder, a useful tool that will kick your construction projects into overdrive. 
 

BUILD YOUR DREAM HOSPITAL
Ready to create your own clinic? Building and managing several hospitals isn‚Äôt easy. You‚Äôll need to be a like a tycoon to construct and oversee vital departments like emergency rooms, intensive care units, and many more. You‚Äôll also have to hire talented staff like skilled surgeons in order to help your patients and create a truly impressive medical center in the process.

PERFORM REALISTIC SURGERIES
Even if you can‚Äôt tell the difference between a bone fracture and a tracheostomy, you‚Äôll definitely enjoy Operate Now: Hospital‚Äôs realistic surgery engine. In this game, you not only manage hospitals, you work as a surgeon in them as well. You‚Äôll get to fix broken bones, help people injured during disasters, and much more. Manipulate surgical tools to cure patients. You‚Äôll need steady hands to make flawless incisions while you carefully operate on your patients. So it‚Äôs time to throw on your scrubs and head down to the ER! What about doing some surgery now?

EXPERIENCE BREATHTAKING DRAMAS
Operate Now: Hospital features dramatic storylines much like the ones in your favorite medical show on TV. You‚Äôll get to work alongside staff members like Dr. Amy Clarke and learn more about their crazy lives both in the hospitals and outside them. You‚Äôll get to experience lots of drama firsthand in Seasons 1 and 2 while you learn more about all the intrigue surrounding the hospitals, their patients, and their staff as well. 

Just like in a real medical center, there‚Äôs never a dull moment in Operate Now: Hospital. So step through its doors when you‚Äôre ready, Doc, and prepare yourself for riveting medical adventures that you‚Äôll never forget! 
Have you played the old Operate Now games as a kid ? Let us know your best memories!

FOLLOW OPERATE NOW: HOSPITAL
https://www.facebook.com/OperateNow
http://www.operatenow.com
https://www.instagram.com/operatenowhospital

recentChanges: Thanks for playing this awesome game! You guys gave us some great feedback, so we made lots of updates.
comments: I used to play this game a year ago, it was lovely. Since I've downloaded it again, the ads are ridiculous. So many ads you can't even play the game and nothing to purchase to get rid of the ads as i like the game enough to pay a couple of bucks to make it ad free. Just recently its also crashing every 2 minutes or so, impossible to play between crashing, long loading time, and ads. Super disappointing for such a fun game otherwise.

I like that game, but now im starting to get annoyed. I built the research department and added staff members to start a research. The research wont start and it wont allow me to remove the staff members. I could be using those staff members to complete missions. Please fix this. It says the game has been updated. I havent played in months. I open the game, but everything is still the same.

It's a great game, but after less than 24 hours of game play, it just exits the game all the time. I can't get anything done. Sometimes it wont even load all the way before it just exits out. Very disappointing because I was liking the game very much. I cleared the cache, 5 times. So that is NOT the solution. And, I see a lot of players having the same issue with no response. I even spent money already. I would hate to delete, but if this cant be fixed, its not worth the frustration.

Really love this game, but like others I am dissatisfied with how the game has been operating lately. I dont have any problems with it crashing like everyone else, but I have 2 of my doctors stuck in research for 2 weeks now. I cant use them for anything because they are locked in there with no count down. Also disappointed that there have not been any events for 3 months. Will change my rating when issues are resolved. You guys have over 10 million downloads can you get it together for us plz

The game is so fun and worth the money it will suck you in. And then it will start closing out on you all the time after you play it a little bit and you can't get the app to open for long or run right. I'm seeing a lot of people had this complaint about a week ago. The problem is still not fixed yet. Sucks because this game really could be awesome.

title: Doctor Game üë®üèª‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è üè•üë©üèª‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è
description:
Educational game for everyone - helping them to get familiar with the doctor's visit experience, so that they are not afraid or puzzled, when they have to visit the doctor next time.  You take on the role of a child doctor and cure the six cute sick patients. Explore and learn about various doctors' tools - all this while curing six common diseases with young kids - dental, ears, cold with fever and finally bone injury - more symptoms like sports injury and eyes check-up were added recently!

It's a fun game for the entire family - parents teaching their children of the different common symptoms, for which the kids generally have to go to the doctor. They play and experience the entire hospital visit in a friendly way. Helping the young children who have got ill or got hurt: aching tooth; smelly mouth; dirty teeth;  sore throat; swollen ears; ear pain; mild fever; sneezing; running nose; displaced bone (simple bone puzzle); upset stomach; and more.
If you love this game, then let us know and we will create a Vet doctor game as well where you can cure dog, panda and other animals.

Features:
- six different lovely young kids to treat.
- six different medical mini treatments.
- more than 15 Dr. tools commonly seen in a clinic.
- friendly expressions, sounds and animation.
- after successfully curing each symptom, kids thanks the doctor i.e. you.
- treatment of disease ends with applause and cheer.
- funny balloons pop game at the end of each diagnosis.


Feedback Please:
If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games, please visit our website www.iabuzz.com or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com

title: Doctor Kids
description:
With the help of this game you can see what is like to be a doctor and treat kids in a children's hospital. You can make them healthy again and put a smile back on their faces. 
 
Children are coming to the clinic and they need your help to get better. Once you appoint the little patients to the right doctor‚Äôs office, you can have fun playing interactive minigames and treat kids in no time. 

Game presents different kinds of doctors and treatments, with many colorful objects to match patients‚Äô characteristics. Every doctor‚Äôs office includes a unique minigame to make treatment even more fun. And don‚Äôt forget about the ambulance car that is always in a hurry.

Within this game, you can do the following:
Appoint your patients to the dentist to brush and fix their broken teeth. 
Diagnose patients to heal them from strange diseases.
Make an eye examination test to improve kids‚Äô eyesight.
Use a microscope to make some lab tests and eliminate viruses. 
Use the X-ray machine to scan bones.
Drive an ambulance car and give first aid to patients.
Treat an ear infection and take a hearing test in the Xylophone minigame.

Features:
‚Ä¢ beautiful high quality HD graphics
‚Ä¢ intuitive, easy to use user interface
‚Ä¢ infinite gameplay with numerous combinations
‚Ä¢ many different patients in various clothes
‚Ä¢ offers 7 unique doctor‚Äôs offices: dental care, eye check, skin rashes cure, lab test and X-ray, ear doctor, ambulance car with emergency room (ER doctor)
‚Ä¢ includes 7 thematic minigames
‚Ä¢ tons of colorful plasters, bandages, braces, glasses and syrup flavours

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml

title: Crazy Doctor
description:
Can you SAVE the lives of your patients? Crazy Doctor is a totally new medical simulation game with smooth gestural controls lovingly handcrafted for your Android phones and tablets.

Play Crazy Doctor and make a name for yourself by curing very ill ordinary people at the fictional hospital. This game is a unique mix of humorous game-play and terrifyingly realistic simulation. By using all kinds of crazy tools to treat various patients, you will gradually evolve from surgical interns to seasoned doctors.

Game Features:
- Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface
- 27 different patients with radically different ways to save
- Easy, fun touch gestures that mimic real surgery activities

Notes: For level 3, you need to recharge the patient first and then give him several injections.

title: Doctor On Demand
description:
Available when you are and without the hassle of the waiting room. Connect in minutes with board-certified physicians and doctoral-level therapists over live video. Just like an in-person visit, your doctor will take your history and symptoms, then will perform an exam.

Some of examples of what we treat:

- Cold & Flu
- UTI
- Allergies
- Depression & Anxiety
- Skin and Eye Issues
- Urgent Care & more

When are doctors available?
Our doctors are available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. You can see a doctor immediately or schedule a visit at your convenience.

Is insurance accepted?
Our services are available with and without an insurance. We also partner with many top employers to reduce your cost.

How much do visits cost?
Doctor On Demand is open to everyone. See exactly what your visit will cost before you connect. There are no monthly fees.

Can my other family members use this too?
Our doctors can help your entire family - including kids. From medical to mental health, we‚Äôre available to make sure your family gets the care they need.


This service is available in all 50 states and the District of Columbia.
descriptionHTML:
Available when you are and without the hassle of the waiting room. Connect in minutes with board-certified physicians and doctoral-level therapists over live video. Just like an in-person visit, your doctor will take your history and symptoms, then will perform an exam.

Some of examples of what we treat:

- Cold & Flu
- UTI
- Allergies
- Depression & Anxiety
- Skin and Eye Issues
- Urgent Care & more

When are doctors available?
Our doctors are available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. You can see a doctor immediately or schedule a visit at your convenience.

Is insurance accepted?
Our services are available with and without an insurance. We also partner with many top employers to reduce your cost.

How much do visits cost?
Doctor On Demand is open to everyone. See exactly what your visit will cost before you connect. There are no monthly fees.

Can my other family members use this too?
Our doctors can help your entire family - including kids. From medical to mental health, we‚Äôre available to make sure your family gets the care they need.


This service is available in all 50 states and the District of Columbia.
summary: Live Video Visits with Board-Certified Physicians and Psychologists
recentChanges: Thanks for choosing Doctor On Demand! We update our app regularly to improve performance and functionality to help you connect with our doctors and manage your health.
comments: This is an excellent resource for urgent care or psychological or psychiatric care. Messaging or calling support staff are convenient options. Scheduling is convenient and it integrates with calendar for appointment reminders. The only downsides are: 1) There is no timer for 50-minute sessions to show remaining time, so watch the clock! 2) Searching for a doctor by a specific specialty is not possible without reading the biography for each doctor.

I cannot recommend this app enough. Between therapy visits and medical doctor visits I have not only saved time and money but I know I've improved my health in ways I couldn't or wouldn't have otherwise. This is a changemaker in our society and I only wish those without insurance had an affordable option. Next step, hopefully. Everyone deserves care.

This is perfect for common ailments that usually costs us $$$ to go to a dr office or clinic to be treated. The app was so easy to use no technical difficulty. They let me know she was running behind but it literally was only a few minutes. I would have had to waste a whole day to go to an urgent care or ER. You get to pick your Dr by reading their Bio and availability time. Highly recommend this app especially if your insurance allows. New era of medical care!

The service is top notch but the app could use some updating. The volume level was very low in the video chat even though I had it turned all the way up to MAX. When entering a credit card it would fail when I used my phone's camera to enter the 16 digit card number but worked fine when I entered it all manually.

This is an EXCELLENT resource for when you cannot get to a clinic or get in to see your PCP the same day. It's a REAL doctor visit with knowledgeable, professional doctors. I actually prefer this service versus going to see my doctor in the clinic or hospital setting. Plus, my medical insurance covered the visit 100%, so no co-pay.

title: Central Hospital Stories
description:
Hurry up doctor, we have an emergency in Central Hospital! A pregnant woman is on her way in the ambulance to give birth, and there is a patient waiting in the laboratory to perform different medical tests to get a diagnosis to his illness and be able to cure him. There's a lot to be done!

Central Hospital Stories is an advanced hospital, full of activities and things to do, where countless adventures and stories between doctors and patients waits for you inside their facilities full of interactions and surprises.

Designed for children, and not so children, between 4 and 14 years old, but appropriate to be enjoyed by the whole family, this new game expands the universe of the saga Stories to trigger your imagination and creativity. Creating stories from the day-to-day in a hospital such as real emergencies in this advanced health facilities.


DISCOVER AN ADVANCED HOSPITAL AND ITS FACILITIES

A five-story hospital with 8 different medical units, a reception, waiting room, ambulance entrance and restaurant that you can visit and manage as you wish. Create stories about medical checkups, diagnoses with X-rays and other advanced machines and cure different illnesses.

The hospital includes a family doctor consultation, a veterinarian, a maternity ward where pregnant women will be able to give birth, an intensive care nursing unit for children and another one for adults, a cutting-edge laboratory, a modern operating room and an staff room where the staff will rest and prepare for the next shift.

CREATE YOUR HOSPITAL STORIES

With so many locations, characters and objects you'll never run out of ideas for your stories. Have fun helping pregnant women to see their new baby in the ultrasound monitor and then help them to give birth, research diseases in the laboratory and perform urgent operations in the operating room or live the day-to-day life of a family doctor doing a routine medical check on the whole family. You Decide!

FEATURES

- Infinite ways to play on 5 floors with 8 medical units: family doctor consultation, veterinarian, maternity, intensive care nursing unit for children and another one for adults, laboratory, operating room and staff room.
- In Addition to the reception there are several common areas that you can also explore: A waiting room, an ambulance entrance and a restaurant.
- Play with 37 characters of different species, ages and genres, representing different roles, both patients and hospital staff.

The free game includes 6 locations and 13 characters for you to play unlimited and try the possibilities of the game. Once you're sure, you'll be able to enjoy the remaining locations through a unique purchase, which will unlock the 13 locations and 37 characters forever.


About PlayToddlers
 
PlayToddlers games have been developed to be enjoyed by all members of the family, regardless of their age. We promote responsible social values and healthy habits in a safe and controlled environment without violence or advertisements from third parties.

title: Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath - Hospital Drama
description:
Become a doctor in a romantic medical drama with aspiring intern Allison Heart!

GameHouse and Blue Giraffe proudly present the latest GameHouse Original Story, starring your favorite doctor, Allison Heart! 
Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath is an intense medical drama tied to a casual game that‚Äôll move you to tears. The game has a gripping and unique storyline, original singer/songwriter music, highly detailed artwork and animation, cool addictive gameplay and an insane amount of heart. If you enjoy games that focus on great storytelling, this game is for you!

‚ù§Ô∏è Experience the life of a doctor as you rush to find a cure for an unknown disease!
‚ù§Ô∏è Your search for a cure will take you through six exciting new hospital wards, from the Clinic to the Morgue.
‚ù§Ô∏è Play the full game with no extra charges, thanks to our free-to-play model. 
‚ù§Ô∏è  More levels to play than ever before! Enjoy 240 levels at launch, with more to come!
‚ù§Ô∏è So many extras! Unlock new story scenes, level up your character to earn helpful bonuses, and purchase the upgrades YOU want to buy
‚ù§Ô∏è  Party with Oliver and his guinea pig friends, Punky and Olive.
‚ù§Ô∏è Master new mini-games like a true doctor, all in medical style.
‚ù§Ô∏è Additional levels will be added in the future, giving you even MORE of the game you love!


Follow Allison as she begins her last rotations as an intern at Queensburrow Bridge Hospital, on her path to graduating as a fully-fledged doctor! Unfortunately, things never go smoothly for Allison, and this is no exception. Dr. Ermey, the lead physician during her clinic rotation, seems to have it in for her, and threatens to fail her. Allison ends up watching her chances of becoming a doctor shrink by the minute, desperately searching for a solution, but unable to find one.
However, everything gets put on hold when a patient with a mysterious disease is admitted to the hospital. Several doctors end up becoming infected themselves, including Connor, Sophia‚Ä¶ and Dr. Ermey. When the CDC quarantines Queensburrow, it‚Äôs a race against time for Allison and the other doctors to find a cure before more deaths occur. 
Your assistance will be invaluable to Allison as she tries to beat the clock and find a cure in time! Experience love, intense action, realistic drama, crazy funny moments and the beauty of celebrating life in Heart‚Äôs Medicine ‚Äì Doctor‚Äôs Oath.

Follow Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

Follow GameHouse on Facebook:: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

*Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Dr. Cares and Fabulous:* https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: I've loved every Heart's Medicine game that's come out so far. Since I'm stuck inside I figured I'd finally try this one. HOWEVER, this one has been glitchy since the moment I started it up. First, the sound wouldn't work. So, I shut down my chromebook and tured it back on. Now it won't open literally more than 2 seconds before shutting down. This needs to be fixed! I can't move on to the next HM game until I know the story from THIS one!

Love the game, but I'm having an issue with it saying I have all of these energy reserves (2 orange juices and 5 salads) when I actually don't. I went to try and use one and kept getting an error message because they aren't really there when it says they are.

Love this game and the characters are awesome!! The only thing I'd like to see among all the games actually is to have them in some sort of order so I know which to play first, second etc... other than that I have no complaints!!!

It's a great game however I just wish that the minigames didn't take the same amount of energy as the main story and that the energy wouldn't take so long to charge. There should be a way of buying energy with diamonds or hearts.

Great game, but lost progress.. I got a new phone and have had my progress wiped :( have to start over :( I don't have my previous game key. And I updated because it says update and get a free gift and all the keys are removed? Is that over now? I also bought a pack with an apple drink and meal, got a receipt and it isn't on my game! So many issues! It was better before when you could just buy the game for 7.99 or something and play the whole thing!

title: WebMD: Check Symptoms, Find Doctors, & Rx Savings
description:
From WebMD, the one healthcare app you need to check symptoms; learn about conditions and drugs; research treatments and diagnoses; find doctors and specialists in your area; get Rx discounts available at your local pharmacy; and set medication reminders.

Key Features: 

‚Ä¢ Symptom Checker ‚Äì Choose your symptoms, learn about potential conditions or issues, and lookup treatment and care options.
‚Ä¢ Doctor Directory ‚Äì Find the closest doctors and specialists based on your current location or search by city, state or zip. 
‚Ä¢ WebMD Rx ‚Äì We partner with major pharmacy chains to find the lowest prescription drug prices, which often beat insurance co-pays. It‚Äôs 100% free to use. No registration required.
‚Ä¢ Medication Reminders ‚Äì Never miss a dose. You‚Äôll receive reminders when it‚Äôs time to take your medications. View daily prescription schedules and instructions, plus pill images with dosage and timing information for each drug. 
‚Ä¢ Conditions ‚Äì Find medically-reviewed information about conditions relevant to you and learn more about causes, treatments, and related symptoms. 
‚Ä¢ Customization and Saving Functionality ‚Äì Save your conditions, drugs, doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, and healthy living articles for secure, easy access and reference. 
‚Ä¢ Drug Interaction Checker ‚Äì Find and identify potentially harmful and unsafe combinations of prescription medications by entering two or more drugs in question.

ABOUT WebMD
WebMD Health Corp. (Nasdaq: WBMD) is the leading provider of health information services, serving consumers, physicians, healthcare professionals, employers, and health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms and health-focused publications. More than 95 million unique visitors access the WebMD Health Network each month.

If you are a California resident, California law may provide you with certain rights regarding our use of your personal information. For more information relevant to our users who are California residents, please review the "California Residents" section of our Privacy Policy linked on this download page or within our app.

The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape, MedicineNet, emedicineHealth, RxList, theheart.org, drugs.com and Medscape Education.
SOURCE WebMD Health Corp.

WebMD. Better Information. Better Health.
WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on the WebMD mobile application.

title: Pet Doctor
description:
Hi everyone, welcome to Libii pet hospital! This time you will become a doctor, and cure some unusual patients, they are our 4 cute babies ----- funny puppy, sweet kitten, cool monkey, and cute bunny! These lovely babies encountered something terrible, and need your help in a hurry, and you are just the one we need!!!
In this game, you can use many different kinds of medical instruments to treat the babies‚Äô illness. Here you can do all the following things for them, such as taking body temperature, infusing, measuring blood pressure, taking X-ray picture, putting ice packs and so on. You not only have nearly 20 medical instruments to use to cure the babies, but also can take advantage of many toys to make them happy. No matter in the treatment process or finish treating, please don‚Äôt forget to take a snapshot for the cute baby!
Therefore, if you really feel interested and excited about such a hospital game, you'll enjoy the experience of being a professional pet doctor!!!
 
How To Play:
Open the game, choose a little baby you like to start. At the bottom of the screen, you can choose different medical instruments to treat the baby, such as dragging the cotton swab to clean the wounds, dragging the tweezers to remove the wood splinters, dragging the X-ray machine onto the patient to find out the fracture parts, dragging the band-aid to cover the patient‚Äôs scatches, and dragging the ice packs to the patient‚Äôs forehead to lower the temperature, etc. Meanwhile, the band-aid, ice packs, infusion bottle have many different styles to choose. After all these treating process, you can take a snapshot for your healthy baby! 
 
Features:
¬∑      4 cute babies to choose from (funny puppy, sweet kitten, cool monkey, and cute bunny)
¬∑      19 medical instruments you can choose to treat the baby
¬∑      Plentiful interesting toys you can choose to make the baby happy
¬∑      A huge variety of decoration items to choose, including funny band-aid, colorful ice packs, attractive infusion bottles and so on
¬∑      Babies will have various expressions and sounds when you are treating them
¬∑      Share your healthy babies via Facebook or E-mail with just one click
¬∑      Snapshots of your babies can be saved in your photo album
¬∑      Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions
 
Need You Know:
This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.
descriptionHTML:
Hi everyone, welcome to Libii pet hospital! This time you will become a doctor, and cure some unusual patients, they are our 4 cute babies ----- funny puppy, sweet kitten, cool monkey, and cute bunny! These lovely babies encountered something terrible, and need your help in a hurry, and you are just the one we need!!!
In this game, you can use many different kinds of medical instruments to treat the babies‚Äô illness. Here you can do all the following things for them, such as taking body temperature, infusing, measuring blood pressure, taking X-ray picture, putting ice packs and so on. You not only have nearly 20 medical instruments to use to cure the babies, but also can take advantage of many toys to make them happy. No matter in the treatment process or finish treating, please don‚Äôt forget to take a snapshot for the cute baby!
Therefore, if you really feel interested and excited about such a hospital game, you'll enjoy the experience of being a professional pet doctor!!!

How To Play:
Open the game, choose a little baby you like to start. At the bottom of the screen, you can choose different medical instruments to treat the baby, such as dragging the cotton swab to clean the wounds, dragging the tweezers to remove the wood splinters, dragging the X-ray machine onto the patient to find out the fracture parts, dragging the band-aid to cover the patient‚Äôs scatches, and dragging the ice packs to the patient‚Äôs forehead to lower the temperature, etc. Meanwhile, the band-aid, ice packs, infusion bottle have many different styles to choose. After all these treating process, you can take a snapshot for your healthy baby!

Features:
¬∑ 4 cute babies to choose from (funny puppy, sweet kitten, cool monkey, and cute bunny)
¬∑ 19 medical instruments you can choose to treat the baby
¬∑ Plentiful interesting toys you can choose to make the baby happy
¬∑ A huge variety of decoration items to choose, including funny band-aid, colorful ice packs, attractive infusion bottles and so on
¬∑ Babies will have various expressions and sounds when you are treating them
¬∑ Share your healthy babies via Facebook or E-mail with just one click
¬∑ Snapshots of your babies can be saved in your photo album
¬∑ Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions

Need You Know:
This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

title: Doctor veterinarian
description:
doctor veterinarian


Many boys and girls dream of becoming doctors from an early age. But most of them do not know about such a necessary and remarkable profession as a veterinarian. That's why our game will be a real find for them. It will help to learn more about this fascinating profession, in the form of a game it will show: how to treat animals, how to care for them, what are actually veterinary clinics and what the doctor does, what he does and what medical tools he uses in his work.
Therefore, we are happy to introduce to you and your kids a new exciting game from the series of developing games for children - Doctor veterinarian.
In this interesting and entertaining game your kids have to go to the fairy forest, the inhabitants of which are sick and they need urgent medical help and treatment. Some of them caught a cold, someone was injured, and someone fell from a tall tree and was badly hurt. And now, in order to recover, they need a real doctor for animals - a veterinarian!
And so, let's get started! Your forest clinic for animals is always open and ready to receive lovely and funny patients who simply need a veterinary first aid. You, as young veterinarians have a responsible and interesting job to treat animals, because helping those who need it is a very necessary, important and useful activity. Your kids will have to learn a lot and try very hard to cure the flu, sun burns and a painful tummy from their young patients, heal the wounds and pull out very sharp spines, measure the temperature, bring out very nimble and annoying fleas, and cure many other diseases.
Educational games, such as a veterinary clinic, will help you and your baby learn a lot of new things, have fun and use their time with great profit, because learning to play is very interesting and exciting. After all, you really have to learn how to heal animals, prescribe drugs to them, do the necessary injections and vaccinations, and much more. After all, your baby, helping his virtual patients recover, learn to follow and monitor their health.
Playing the game veterinary clinic, your baby can begin his journey as a real veterinarian, can create the most real miracles, healing sick animals.
All that is necessary is to download and install our game on your tablet or phone and go to the fascinating world of the game veterinary clinic for animals to get all the most necessary knowledge to help forest residents in recovery and make them happy.
 
Visit us at: Site: http://y-groupgames.com

comments: Fun but short. Good for kids!

I don't usually write reviews for apps that I use ,but this game is really wonderful . My 2 years old loves it ,we even role-played the game with our dolls. I like that it gives a back story to every injury and that some of them have a moral value for my toddler ,like don't eat too much candy or don't play under the rain . My only concern is the relative difficulty in some requirements for young ages ,like the owl's x-ray or the dropping drug bottle to aim kn the animals' mouths.

My daughter loves this app. I would gladly pay for an ad free version but I don't see the option to. She hasn't played it in awhile so when she played it today I was surprised to see so many ads. She downloaded 2 apps in under 2 minutes by accident. Please add either a buy out option or some kind of lock system that prevents unwanted downloads. Thank you!

My two year old loves this game, which is great, but she clicked on an ad and Post Malone's "Rockstar"started to play. Wouldn't be a big complaint, but her tablet literally blasted obscenities from an uncensored version. I clicked out of it & let her continue to play... Then a few minutes later an uncensored version of "Motorsport" started to play. COMPLETELY UNACCEPTABLE FOR A CHILDREN'S GAME!! DO BETTER!!
Super Cute! I love it!

title: Heart's Medicine - Season One ‚ù§Ô∏è
description:
Go back to the beginning of Allison Heart's epic story to become a doctor

Assist med school student Allison Heart as she starts her career as a doctor in a hospital in small-town America! A game that follow the story of a girl who becomes an unwitting hero.

Sharpen your medical skills in Heart‚Äôs Medicine ‚Äì Season One, the prequel to the exciting hospital game Heart‚Äôs Medicine - Time to Heal. Work alongside Doctor Heart as she goes from inexperienced girl to expert surgeon at Little Creek Hospital. Feel the adrenaline rush as you try to diagnose, treat, operate on and cure all patients in time. Can you keep up with this fast-paced time management story game?

As a little girl, Allison watched her father die. Then, a few years ago, Allison assisted at the scene of a horrible accident. That‚Äôs when she realized she had to go to medical school. Now she‚Äôs back at Little Creek Hospital, a hometown girl ready to start her dream job as a doctor. But then the dream meets the reality of hospital life‚Ä¶

Not all patients are easy to handle, not all diseases are treatable and not all dreams come true. What‚Äôs crucial is that Allison learns to accept her duties as a doctor. She will need to concentrate on the injuries and health of her patients, doing what she can to ease their suffering. Luckily, she has a lifeline in the form of great colleagues, who are more than willing to help her on her way.

Besides the emergencies she faces as an intern, Allison will also need to navigate the choppy waters of the romance game. Not one, but TWO handsome doctors vie for her attentions. Will this lead to complications?

‚öïÔ∏è Complete the amazing Heart‚Äôs Medicine series on your mobile device!

title: Zocdoc Find A Doctor & Book On Demand Appointments
description:
Zocdoc is the start of a better health care journey for you. Find a doctor, book a same day appointment and search for medical professionals that match your health insurance plan. From a local dentist, to a physician, book the best doctors and get care on demand.

With Zocdoc, you can compare local doctors and book appointments that work with your schedule. Worried about whether a local dentist or physician takes your health care insurance? Use the Zocdoc health insurance checker and filter for providers who accept your health care plan. Keep track of your check ups and manage all of your doctors appointments on demand in one, user-friendly place. 

5 reasons you‚Äôll love using the award-winning Zocdoc app:

1. Find a doctor on demand and book a same day appointment.
2. Book appointments with the best local doctors based on reviews from other patients. 
3. Find a doctor that matches your health insurance by scanning your health insurance card.
4. Get health care when you need it by filling out your waiting room forms online.
5. Set and receive reminders so that you never forget to book appointments.

Even if you hate the dentist, Zocdoc can help you find the best local dentist to ensure the best health care experience possible. With the Zocdoc app, find a doctor or physician on demand and book appointments online.

Take the hassle out of health care. Find a doctor according to your symptoms and discover specialists in over 50 categories. From a local dentist to primary care doctors, pediatricians, OBGYNs, family doctors, urologists, psychologists, dermatologists, and more - you‚Äôre guaranteed to find a physician that suits your needs! Book a same day appointment and get better fast. 

Zocdoc makes it easy to get the right care when you need it the most. 

Download Zocdoc today for all of your health care needs.

comments: Horrible!!! I've booked different doctors, at different time, about 5 times!!! They're never avaliable, or time what shows at this app avaliable - is unavailable! They always calling me, or living messages that doctor or time what was at this app unavailable!!! Every time!!! If doctors or time is unavailable, why you put them at this app like avaliable?!!!!!! Waste of my time!!!!!! I still can't see the doctors which I need!!! Because call center continue put me on reschedule my appointment

Great app, but the developer REFUSES to spend time on the sorting and filtering features in the app. You run a search for an internist and get results where 8 out of the 10 of the top 10 results don't practice adult or family medicine. A podiatrist? Really? Sort by distance and you get doctors 15 miles away before the doctor 3 miles away. C'mon guys. Do better! This app is supposed to create efficiency, right?

I like the app, but a big flaw is payment. A day or so after your first appointment you will get a phonecall of someone saying they work for Zocdoc and need your credit card details in case you would cancel your appointment. This is a big security flaw, because there is no way to verify if the person actually works for Zocdoc. Payment should be part of the app itself!

This app even their website are not accurate. I booked a doctor appointment only to be called and told the Doctor doesn't treat a certain condition even though Zocdoc app and website say they do. This has happened twice now. Don't know why I bothered using a third party app instead of just calling doctor offices myself.

I usually love this App but it's not allowing me to make an appointment for my dad. It keeps telling me "oops something went wrong" everytime I try to verify the phone number. I emailed them this morning and didnt even receive a confirmation that they recieved my email.

title: Doctor Kids 2
description:
Seize the opportunity to see what is like to be a multi-tasking doctor in this fun game. 
 
Check the respiratory system, fix sore throat problems, get rid of head lice, heal digestive problems, use a head MRI scan or fly an emergency helicopter. Use your medical skills and spread a bit of happiness to your sick little patients. 
 
This game offers 6 thematic minigames:
‚Ä¢ Lungs: Use a breathing machine, kill the bacteria in Archer minigame and choose an inhaler to open up the airways. 
‚Ä¢ Throat: Take a swab with a medical stick and eliminate viruses in Bubble shooter minigame. Fresh ice cream is always a good solution for a sore throat! 
‚Ä¢ Head lice: Find head lice with the help of a magnifying glass, get rid of them and choose a super shampoo for anti-lice treatment.
‚Ä¢ Stomach: Use CT scan to examine all organs in the body and find out which one needs healing, eliminate viruses and choose the right pill.
‚Ä¢ Neurology: Scan a head, solve a brain puzzle and choose one of the bandages.
‚Ä¢ Ambulance: Fly an emergency helicopter and save kids from burning skyscrapers.
 
Kids are already waiting for your help! It‚Äôs up to you to heal them!

This game offers basic gameplay free of charge but certain in-game items and features (buying virtual currency, disabling ads or playing minigame Neurology) may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. You can earn virtual currency by playing the game or buy them in the in-game store. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.

The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app. You can always remove third-party advertising by making in-app purchase 'No ads''.  

The game includes tasks comparable to real life events although adjustments were made due to the audience and limitations of mobile environment. Therefore, the knowledge acquired by playing the game cannot be used in real life.    

By downloading this game you accept our Terms of service (https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml) and Privacy policy (https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml).

title: K Health | Primary Care & Telemedicine
description:
K Health provides digital primary care for less. We use smart technology to bring you top-notch telemedicine at a fraction of the price.

The internet doesn‚Äôt understand who you are or your medical history, and seeing a doctor can be expensive and inconvenient. But with K Health, you get smart health information for free and can chat with an expert doctor in minutes, all for less than a copay. Turn to K Health anytime you don‚Äôt feel well to understand your symptoms, chat with a doctor, get a prescription, or manage any other primary healthcare need you may have.

Use K‚Äôs risk assessment to understand any symptoms you may be experiencing and connect with a doctor for less than a co-pay.

HOW IT WORKS
First, understand what‚Äôs most likely wrong for free. Chat with K to learn how doctors diagnosed and treated thousands of people like you with similar symptoms. Rather than worrying and waiting, get immediate answers you can trust.

Next, chat with an expert doctor to discuss treatment options (no insurance needed). They‚Äôll review your case, advise the best treatment plan, and prescribe medication or lab tests if necessary. 

Come back to K Health as your symptoms evolve, or when you have new questions in the future. Your medical history will be saved in one easy to review place and you can get continuous care over time from great doctors.

WHY YOU CAN TRUST K
We never sell, rent, or share your personal health information. K is both HIPAA + GDPR compliant, meaning it is both secure and private.

K was built by hundreds of expert doctors and scientists

K‚Äôs information is based on millions of real medical cases, not on rules written by a small handful of people

K helps thousands of people live healthier lives every day -- see our 10,000+ 5-star ratings in the App Stores!

Talk to K and our expert doctors about:
Cold & flu symptoms
Back pain & neck pain
Headaches
Abdominal pain
Chest pain
Rashes
Fatigue
Stress
Bladder infections
Insomnia
Anxiety & depression
Hundreds of other health symptoms and medical conditions

You speak, we listen!
Your feedback helps us improve K.
Support: feedback@khealth.ai
Learn more at http://khealth.ai

But with K Health, you get smart health information for free and can chat with an expert doctor in minutes, all for less than a copay. Turn to K Health anytime you don‚Äôt feel well to understand your symptoms, chat with a doctor, get a prescription, or manage any other primary healthcare need you may have.

Use K‚Äôs risk assessment to understand any symptoms you may be experiencing and connect with a doctor for less than a co-pay.

HOW IT WORKS
First, understand what‚Äôs most likely wrong for free. Chat with K to learn how doctors diagnosed and treated thousands of people like you with similar symptoms. Rather than worrying and waiting, get immediate answers you can trust.

Next, chat with an expert doctor to discuss treatment options (no insurance needed). They‚Äôll review your case, advise the best treatment plan, and prescribe medication or lab tests if necessary.

Come back to K Health as your symptoms evolve, or when you have new questions in the future. Your medical history will be saved in one easy to review place and you can get continuous care over time from great doctors.

WHY YOU CAN TRUST K
We never sell, rent, or share your personal health information. K is both HIPAA + GDPR compliant, meaning it is both secure and private.

K was built by hundreds of expert doctors and scientists

K‚Äôs information is based on millions of real medical cases, not on rules written by a small handful of people

K helps thousands of people live healthier lives every day -- see our 10,000+ 5-star ratings in the App Stores!

Talk to K and our expert doctors about:
Cold & flu symptoms
Back pain & neck pain
Headaches
Abdominal pain
Chest pain
Rashes
Fatigue
Stress
Bladder infections
Insomnia
Anxiety & depression
Hundreds of other health symptoms and medical conditions

You speak, we listen!
Your feedback helps us improve K.
Support: feedback@khealth.ai
Learn more at http://khealth.ai

comments: Would not recommend. I didn't even get to the actual "talk to a doctor" portion. I took the evaluation, and entered my info. This app is absolutely wonderful! title: Doctor for animals
description:
When an adult or a child gets hurt or ill they definitely needs care and
treatment. And only a hospital and a real doctor can help him to get well. After
all, only a good doctor can cure even the most serious illness! The same
thing happens to animals. Practically children's and animal hospitals aren‚Äôt
different; both children and animals need emergency medical care. And to
give your kids a positive experience of visiting a hospital and being afraid of
no doctors we created this fascinating game which continues our series of
educational games for children: ¬´Bear the Doctor."
Playing the game your baby have an opportunity to find out what to be doctor
really is, what he does. Children can try his hands and find out how patients
are treated and how they can be treated as soon as possible. Baby learns
various types of treatment for diseases and all kinds of injuries, treat animals
for fractures, dislocations, colds, eye and ear diseases. Drive an ambulance
and quickly rush to the victim to help. Perform operations and save virtual
pets from all kinds of health problems. Understand what an ambulance is and
how it saves patients.
Our game about doctor is very informative and fascinating. It can show your
baby a lot of interesting things. And if your child likes to play games about
hospitals this one is a godsend. Come on! The animal clinic is already open!
Start treating! Prove that you are the best doctor in the whole world!

Be sure to visit our website at http://yovogames.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudio

title: Doctor Pets
description:
Doctor Pets brings you a great chance to make animals healthy and happy again.

The nature is home for a playful motley crew of animals. Dogs, cats, rabbits and monkeys are looking for your help in a forest pet hospital. They need doctor's help and they need it right now!

Some of your pets have fever, ear infection, sore throat or stomach ache, while the rest have been hurt in the fall. You can use your medical knowledge and a lot of instruments to cure different diseases and injuries. Make your hairy friends recover so that they will be able to enjoy running and playing again.

At first, make a diagnosis:
‚Ä¢ Fever: Take pet's temperature and cure the fever with an ice pack, drops and syrup.
‚Ä¢ Ear infection: Eliminate viruses in a minigame and plug up pet's ear with a cotton wool.
‚Ä¢ Sore throat: Tap with your finger all germs inside animal‚Äôs mouth and spray the sore throat.
‚Ä¢ Hurt in the fall: Pull out all foreign objects, spray the ticks and add some balm on the rashes.
‚Ä¢ Stomach ache: Catch all candies and choose the right food for a certain animal.

After a successful treatment, you can rejoice with pet patients and Àùgive them fiveÀù! 

Features:
‚Ä¢ HD illustrations
‚Ä¢ cool sound effects
‚Ä¢ fun minigames
‚Ä¢ 5 different health treatments
‚Ä¢ cute patients: cats, dogs, rabbits and monkeys
‚Ä¢ lots of injuries, diseases, instruments and colorful plasters

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml

recentChanges: Fixes on AdMob
comments: I was under the assumption that as long as you watched the ads the game was free. It wont let me go past level 6, it says I have to at least pay 1.99. I was really disappointed. Update- Thank you for responding. I was trying to play free watching ads. I got to level 6 and it only showed me a screen that said purchasento okay and the amounts. Even though I clicked the button that should have showed me an ad. It was very frustrating. This isn't the first time I have had these issues with your game

Just completed this game. Never lost interest as every level was different. This differs from other apps like this as in they have an actual storyline as well. Getton "Allison"and all at Hearts Hospital. Looking forward to the next part of the story..... P. S I have just one tiny weeny "complaint"- it became a little difficult to see everything as it was so small for me, although once I'd found my glasses, it was all good!!

I don't normally leave reviews but I was a bit perturbed by that fact that after passing level 15, the game automatically restarted. I was enjoying making progress and was highly enthused as it was one of the best games I've played thus far. However, after it restarted I couldn't see myself doing everything again from scratch hence I decided to uninstall it as I was disappointed.

This is the best doctor game i have ever played and I love the storyline and mini games! This is inspiring and captivating because I want to work in a hospital some day. I like how you can go around all the wards and even the cafe as you play fun mini games. The music is one of. My favorite parts of the game.. I love this game and I would suggest a feature where you can create yourself as a doctor character and make choices. I highly recommend and I can't wait for episode 3! :-)

HM2 4 iPad has a version where ea lvl has 5 stars. Is there a 5 star / lvl version 4 the tablet? Lvl 13 (iPad) has become stuck after the 3rd star on replay 4 4 stars - I'm loath 2 delete & re-install in case I can't get it again. Also, there are no hamsters showing or squeaking in Emily's kitchen lvls yet there's a # 4 1.

title: Doctor Kids 4
description:
Welcome to the hospital for children, where medicine meets kindness. You can become the chief of medicine and learn how to give more sympathy to people. 

Patients choose our hospital for the experience we have and quality of our pediatricians. As a doctor, you will be able to provide professional treatment services and take care of your little patients. Face with chickenpox, different types of allergies, stomach ache, low bone density, brain problems and cave rescue operation.

Kids are in a poor state of health so get them back to normal.
‚Ä¢ Chickenpox: Use a thermometer, beat the viruses and choose protective gloves for the kid.
‚Ä¢ Allergies: Open the airways with a breathing machine, take an allergy test and find out what food substitutes the child needs.
‚Ä¢ Digestive system: Examine abdomen with ultrasound, remove parasites and choose a herbal syrup for the aching stomach.
‚Ä¢ Bone density: Measure bone density, collect as much calcium and vitamin D as you can and learn what food is good for bone health.
‚Ä¢ Brain: Place the electrodes and measure brain activity, connect neurons and pick food to boost patient‚Äôs brainpower.
‚Ä¢ Ambulance service: Rescue kids from the cave and bring them up safely.

Features:
‚Ä¢ different mini games and health treatments
‚Ä¢ lots of injuries, diseases, doctor‚Äôs tools and equipment

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml

title: Caillou Check Up - Doctor
description:
Budge Studios presents Caillou Check Up! Go to the doctor‚Äôs office with Caillou and solve fun mini-games that teach kids all about the human body. Check his height and weight, test his vision, play with cool doctor tools such a stethoscope, and lots more! 

FEATURES 
‚Ä¢ Learn about doctor visits in a fun way! 
‚Ä¢ 11 mini-games designed for toddlers and preschoolers 
‚Ä¢ Secret bonus mini-game for completing the check up! 
‚Ä¢ Wide variety of game mechanics (Tap to choose, puzzle, drag along a path, microphone, multi-tap, drag to correct location) 
‚Ä¢ Congratulatory payoff animation for each step 
‚Ä¢ Caillou‚Äôs voice guides kids through the appointment 
‚Ä¢ Localized in English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Turkish, and German 
‚Ä¢ Tablet compatible

MINI-GAMES

‚Ä¢ Applying ointment

A Parents‚Äô Choice 2014 Approved Award Winner

For more fun, be sure to try Caillou House of Puzzles to explore Caillou‚Äôs house and solve fun jigsaw puzzles!

PRIVACY & ADVERTISING

Budge Studios takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws, including the¬†Child Online Privacy Protection Act¬†(COPPA), a privacy legislation in the United States of America. This application has received the ‚ÄúESRB (Entertainment Software Rating Board) Privacy Certified Kids‚Äô Privacy Seal‚Äù. If you would like to learn more on what information we collect and how we use it, please visit our privacy policy at:¬†https://budgestudios.com/en/legal/privacy-policy/. If ¬†you have any questions, email our Privacy Officer at :¬†privacy@budgestudios.ca

Before you download this app, please note that it is free to play, but additional content may be available via in-app purchases. This app may contain contextual advertising from Budge Studios regarding other apps we publish, from our partners and some third parties. Budge Studios does not permit behavioral advertising or retargeting in this app. The app may also contain social media links that are only accessible behind a parental gate.

Please note that this app gives users the ability to record audio and save the file locally on his/her mobile device. These audio files are never shared with other users in-app, nor are they shared with any unaffiliated third party companies.¬†

TERMS OF USE / END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT

This application is subject to an End-User License Agreement available through the following link: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal/eula/

comments: I am absolutely FURIOUS that I just paid for the full app to avoid adds, only for my 2 yr old daughter to show me that the adds were still there! If adds can't be removed after the full game is purchased, you shouldn't be accepting people's money. UNACCEPTABLE. I will wait for your reply with a solution or refund. I guess I won't be paying to unlock the other apps we have dl'd either. We will sadly only be limited to the ones I had paid for back when my six year old was playing them. Too bad...
Awesome this is awesome for the kids I would recommend download a disc game for your 2 year olds or how old your kid is this is the awesome game

This app is an abomination and a disgrace to caillou. The games not long enough, and you have to pay $6 to unlock a few minutes games. It's not worth the storage on your phone, or the time it spent to create.
I bought the full version for my children & there are still too many ads that pop up. It is frustrating. I understand that with the free version but not after I paid for it.

I purchased this app to avoid all of the ads, and I am so disappointed to find out that there are ads all the way through this! I would say this is a cute app however, there are ads that pop up constantly even after you pay the full price

title: Kids Hospital: Eye Doctor
description:
Hospital game is an exciting and educational game for kids. It is very popular among our small pioneers. While helping the patients of Hippo hospital, a little eye doctor learns how to be careful, attentive and kind. Especially for you, our Hospital game is renewed with a new cabinet. Our beloved Hippy is an eye doctor today! It means, that new hospital games are waiting for us today! Problems with eyesight? Don't worry, patients will be cured by the best eye doctor in the world, your kids.

Every day ambulance delivers new patients to the hospital. They will be examined by Hippo. The phone rings without pause. Somebody need to have an injection, somebody needs to be operated urgently, and somebody needs just to choose contact lenses and check eyesight. Somebody has a virus eye infection or just irritation. Our doctor eye doctor will do his own special tests and help everybody! Kind Hippy doctor is an ophthalmologist of international level, and today she is ready to share her secrets with you. Let's go to the Hippo hospital! Anybody who will come today to the hippo hospital, will have an examination, have eyesight tests and will get all the needed injections and firs aid! To cure patients and make this world better are secrets, that every doctor should know. This is the game hospital for kids! It means that we are not afraid of any difficult operation. Do you want to check your eyesight with the best eye specialist?

A new eye doctor game, as well as all our educational games for boys and girls, is absolutely for free. Have a lot of positive emotions together with your kids! Hospital Hippo games are interesting and exciting. Stay tuned and stay with us. Our free games for boys and girls will always make you and your kids happy.

title: Amwell: Doctor Visits 24/7
description:
High-quality, affordable medical care is in the palm of your hands - and on-demand - with Amwell.

Amwell is the best way to see a doctor in minutes. Amwell connects you to board-certified, experienced medical providers. High-quality healthcare is now available, 24/7, with on-demand or scheduled appointments, often with with next day availability. 

Amwell brings healthcare home, so that you can feel better, faster.


AMWELL IS EASY AS 1 -2 -3

1. Download the app
2. Choose the type of visit
3. Choose your provider

No more driving to the doctor or sitting in waiting rooms. With Amwell, quality medical providers are available 24/7, to help you feel better faster.


AMWELL DOCTORS HAVE SEEN IT ALL

Our experienced clinicians can provide the care you need quickly. Common patients concerns include:

‚Ä¢ Urgent Care:  bronchitis, sinus & respiratory infections, sore throat, diarrhea, cold/flu, gout, strep throat, urinary tract infections, pink eye, hypertension, migraines, pneumonia

‚Ä¢ Therapy:  depression & anxiety, ADHD/ADD, bereavement, trauma, couples therapy, stress, divorce, sleep disorders

‚Ä¢ Psychiatry:  anorexia, bipolar disorder, panic attacks, PTSD, OCD, psychosis, insomnia, substance abuse

‚Ä¢ Nutrition:  weight concerns, food allergies, meal planning, high blood pressure, pediatric nutrition, digestive disorders, pregnancy diets

‚Ä¢ Lactation Consulting: breastfeeding help


AFFORDABLE PRICES FOR SERVICES YOU NEED

We believe quality healthcare should be accessible and affordable. That‚Äôs why before insurance, Amwell costs:

‚Ä¢ $69 or less for urgent care
‚Ä¢ $95 or less for online therapy 
‚Ä¢ $200 initial online psychiatry visit, follow-up visit $90
‚Ä¢ $45 or less for nutrition counseling visits
* $130 initial breastfeeding support visit, follow-up visit $75

Have health insurance? Many major carriers cover Amwell visits. To check if yours does, simply enter your health insurance information to see the price you will pay for your visit. It‚Äôs that easy.


PATIENTS AGREE - AMWELL IS EASY & CONVENIENT

We couldn‚Äôt have said it better ourselves ‚Ä¶ take their word for it!

‚Ä¢ ‚Äú[The visit] took 20 minutes and prescription has been called in. The same process with my local doctor would‚Äôve taken 2 to 3 hours between drive time, wait time, visit, and returning back to work.‚Äù

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúI honestly have to say this is one of the best new services I have ever used‚Ä¶I was able to download the app, pick a doctor, and ‚Äúsee‚Äù the doctor right from my iPhone.‚Äù

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúThe whole process is easy to set up, within minutes we were connected to a video conference with a medical professional who was very thorough but more important, really took the time to listen.‚Äù


100% SECURE & CONFIDENTIAL

We take your privacy very seriously. Your visit with the doctor is confidential and HIPAA compliant.


AWARDS AND RECOGNITION

‚Ä¢ Most Popular Mobile Telehealth Platform of 2014-2016 ‚Äì App Annie
‚Ä¢ Best Telemedicine App of 2016 ‚Äì Healthline
‚Ä¢ First telehealth service awarded accreditation by the American Telemedicine Association


CONNECT WITH US

To learn more or get your questions answered, please reach out to us!

‚Ä¢ Web:  www.amwell.com 
‚Ä¢ Facebook:  www.facebook.com/amwellpatient
‚Ä¢ Twitter:  www.twitter.com/amwell 
‚Ä¢ Email:  support@americanwell.com

summary: See a doctor anytime. Doctors are available 24/7, no appointment needed.
recentChanges:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
‚Ä¢ Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed
comments: There was some significant lag time but the overall service was really good. The wait time was less than an in-person doctor visit. The availability of doctors was also good, though as expected there are no specialists. The line for the doctor I selected was long, but there was an option to auto-connect to the first available physician. This was very helpful and greatly decreased wait time.

This app is a joke. It will bounce you around then tell you the provider is offline and boot you after you tell it to find another physician sooner than the one you're waiting for. If you tell it you'll wait then you'll wait for at least 2 hours then be told the provider is offline. Either way you might as well send up smoke signals and hope for a response. 4 1/2 hours wasted on multiple attempts.

Horrible app design. It will randomly bring you from the waiting room back to the login page while the app is open. If you switch to another app and back it brings you to the sign-in page, so you effectively loose your spot in line.
Quick and easy. No need to go around sick people with just a migraine. The Doctor is very knowledgeable and listened to all I had to say. Very great experience.

This works well for me. I've used it twice so far. The first time it was seamless. the second time was tonight the doctor didnt know someone was waiting to see her. Mistakes happen so I ended up waiting a little longer. Nbd. The visits are cheap I paid $120 at an urgent care without using insurance so this is a good deal as.long as you dont need to be seen in person. I would recommend it.

title: DocsApp - Consult Doctor Online 24x7 on Chat/Call
description:
DocsApp is India's No 1 Online Doctor consultation app

Tips to use DocsApp: 

* With DocsApp you can ask your Health or Medical questions to specialist doctors for diagnosis and medical advice.
* A specialist Doctor will be appointed to you instantly after a one-time consultation fee.
* Once a doctor is assigned, you can start a chat or video/audio call privately with the doctor.
* You can even upload health reports and photos for the Doctor to understand the issue better. 
* After your consultation you can order medicines or book a lab test online through DocsApp
* Medicines will be delivered to your doorstep.
* Test samples will be picked up from the comfort of your home.
* A Specialist Doctor will help you understand your free online test report at no extra cost. 
* DocsApp is also your online Medical record.

The DocsApp Advantage:

Get 24x7 specialist doctor consultations across 20+ specialities on DocsApp, by that we mean even late night
Doctors on DocApp are specialist MD Doctors. 
You consultations are secure & private
Get a second opinion on critical health concerns from doctors practicing in top cities in India
Read health tips by specialist doctors 
5000+ specialist Doctors have already given answers, consultations and health tips to more than 10 million people. 
Our Doctors are from Bangalore, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Delhi & other top cities in India
Answer simple questions & get a customized diet chart for diet on DocsApp.

Remember: More than 70% of health problems can be treated online by a doctor through a chat or call consultation. However, for severe & critical medical emergencies, we recommend you to rush to your nearby hospital.

descriptionHTML:
DocsApp is India's No 1 Online Doctor consultation app

Tips to use DocsApp:

* With DocsApp you can ask your Health or Medical questions to specialist doctors for diagnosis and medical advice.
* A specialist Doctor will be appointed to you instantly after a one-time consultation fee.
* Once a doctor is assigned, you can start a chat or video/audio call privately with the doctor.
* You can even upload health reports and photos for the Doctor to understand the issue better.
* After your consultation you can order medicines or book a lab test online through DocsApp
* Medicines will be delivered to your doorstep.
* Test samples will be picked up from the comfort of your home.
* A Specialist Doctor will help you understand your free online test report at no extra cost.
* DocsApp is also your online Medical record.

The DocsApp Advantage:

Get 24x7 specialist doctor consultations across 20+ specialities on DocsApp, by that we mean even late night
Doctors on DocApp are specialist MD Doctors.
You consultations are secure & private
Get a second opinion on critical health concerns from doctors practicing in top cities in India
Read health tips by specialist doctors
5000+ specialist Doctors have already given answers, consultations and health tips to more than 10 million people.
Our Doctors are from Bangalore, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Delhi & other top cities in India
Answer simple questions & get a customized diet chart for diet on DocsApp.

Remember: More than 70% of health problems can be treated online by a doctor through a chat or call consultation. However, for severe & critical medical emergencies, we recommend you to rush to your nearby hospital.

comments: Awesome app made my life so easier. Most of the time for normal health issues we didn't visit to doctor and just buy medicines on our own with the help of shopkeeper, which can be very harmful for our health. With the help of this app I can talk to a doctor in just 30 minutes and all doctors are very humble and professional. I have lot to write for you guys. You are just awesome. Thank u so much for making such wonderful app for everyone.

Well..Well... UI is little difficult to older people. Support history should be in front. Complete health check up..I love it everyone should take it for family members...All over exeperience is fabulous. Also add select option in support history for copy paste and share message to another person.
It's an amazing app! The doctors,the support,the lab tests team.Everyone is extremely helpful, patient and understanding. I will recommend taking the Gold membership.

It is really a awesome app. General we are not want to talk with doctors about sexual problems and not able to watch our private part. But here, there is nothing worried about. Because there is no any identity of mine is disclosed.

I'm a Docsapp gold member. I needed doctor consultation urgently. I contacted Docsapp at 9:20 didn't get consultation by 10:50. Tried reaching customer support several times but didn't get proper response. Docsapp has provided unexpectedly bad experience.

title: Doctor Games For Girls - Hospital ER
description:
S Doctor Games For Girls - Hospital ER is educational game you can be a doctor and treat Girls in a children's hospital. You can make them healthy again and put a smile back on their faces. with this Girls games you make little Girls expert hospital emergency doctor. ER Surgeon lets start with basic health checkup, monitor blood pressure, respiratory system, health and fitness in hospital Girls doctor games. Hospital doctor games is full of crucial patients suffering from different injuries, heart diseases that require crazy surgeon to be available.

Children are coming to the clinic, injured or suffering from various diseases, and they need your help to get better. Turn your Girls into a professional star doctor, operate your own clinic and hospital, cure different kinds of patients with various diseases along with your assistant nurse! Unlock them and progress for more treatments like, killing bacterias, tummy cure, bones treatment, dentist treatment and much more. Cure your way through the quirkiest and funniest diseases in Doctor Games For Girls - Hospital ER



Check the availability of doctor surgeon in ER emergency room, kidney doctor, eye surgery doctor, lungs doctor, eye surgery doctor and treat the patient of knee surgery and foot sole injury well. Its going to be a tough Girls hospital duty but little Girls need to learn how it feels to be a crazy surgeon doctor in Girls hospital life saving mission. Game presents various injuries and different kinds of doctors and treatments, with many colorful objects to match patients‚Äô characteristics. Every doctor‚Äôs office includes a unique minigame to make treatment even more fun. And don‚Äôt forget about the ambulance car that is always in a hurry. You are the life line in emergency hospital and life saving is your ultimate goal. For doing your hospital duty well you need to perform various surgery with life saving tools and injection. Call the ER hospital emergency doctor and anesthetist timely so the surgery do not get delayed. 


Features:

‚Ä¢ beautiful high quality HD graphics
‚Ä¢ Become a professional surgeon in Girls hospital games!
‚Ä¢ infinite gameplay with numerous combinations
‚Ä¢ Complete challenging life saving missions!
‚Ä¢ Amazing fun hospital nurse simulator Girls game.


S Doctor Games For Girls - Hospital ER is a simulator hospital game where you cure, manage and maintain your very own hospital ! 
In this realistic simulation game, your objective is cure patients and to put your medical facility at the number one spot in the world hospital. With addictive and fast-paced gameplay, a fun soundtrack! 
Play as a budding doctor and prove your healthcare prowess through careful prioritization and diagnostic skills. Keep checking patients heart, brain, lungs, kidney, eye, ear, nose liver, tongue, stomach and other body part to prevent them getting into frozen state. Like a real surgeon doctor give proper attention and treatment to patients in Girls Hospital Emergency Rescue - Doctor Games. Enjoy playing hospital games with levels free without wifi! Download **Doctor Games For Girls - Hospital ER** and learn about the life of doctors in virtual doctor games!
