comments: An absolutely beautiful surgery hospital game that can draw you in for hours of engaging gameplay. Not only is it fun, but it can teach a kid the basics of human anatomy in a playful fay. I can definitely recommend it.

Has the best graphics. It's safe for kids and adults to play kids doctor and little doctor . It's informative and I had great experience with it. It's contents are perfect especially the little doctor tools. Surgery doctor is free for kids!!!

This is one of the best kid's doctor games. My daughter loves playing this game. She can easily become a doctor and play the game as a doctor. The app is always getting better and better. I would recommend this app to kids out there.
The game is quite colorful and attractive. It may too simple for a serious gamer but quite fun for passing time. Its title sounds feminine but men can also have a go at it.

So nice girls game for my daughter. She is like a little doctor in kids hospital. It is really nice for her to enjoy her free time and keep having fun while i am not with her. Also it is light and easy to use

title: Dentist Surgery ER Emergency Doctor Hospital Games
description:
Behold The Very FIRST 3D DENTIST GAMES on Play Store! In Dentist Surgery ER Emergency Doctor Hospital Games you do Emergency Dentist Surgery in Hospital ER Emergency Room. In this First 3D Dentist games you will treat dental patients suffering from bad tooth diseases. You are an experienced Dental Surgeon in this hospital Simulation working in City Hospital Emergency Room. In Dentist Surgery ER Emergency Doctor Hospital Games, patients keep coming in to dental clinic of ER Doctor Hospital & you‚Äôre the only emergency dentist doctor surgeon who can treat patient of tooth ache by doing dental surgery. Hey Tooth Doctor sterilize your dental surgeon tools, fix dental chair & be prepared in emergency room to give dental care in 3D Dentist Games. Fix teeth problems like tooth cavity, sore gums & carry out emergency dental surgery with injection, filling cavities & pulling teeth plaques. Provide dental care to your patients in the best surgery games & ER doctor simulator
Dentist Surgery ER Emergency Doctor Hospital Games is new concept dental games that you would surely love, especially if you love dentist hospital simulation & dental surgeon games. Every city hospital dentist games patient requires different dental treatment & you will have to do dental surgery to heal them in ER surgery games, unlike other operation games. Lot of patient come to dental clinic emergency room without dentist appointment to get dental surgery from tooth doctor. You are the best dental surgeon in this hospital simulation. Our Emergency dentist doctor games have best teeth doctor & Emergency Dental Care with advanced dentist surgery tools e.g. Dentist Chair, surgery braces, tooth brushes & emergency dentist office to give best emergency room dental care in 3D Dentist games
It‚Äôs a new day in Dentist Surgery ER Emergency Doctor Hospital Games & here comes a new patient to get teeth cleaning from an ER doctor Dental surgeon in tooth games. Take him to the dentist office in emergency room of dental clinic. After making dentist appointment & check-up, dental surgeon will brush dirty teeth, pull infected teeth to prevent bacterial infection & do X-ray scan in dental games operation room. Teeth doctor has done his tooth games diagnosis & will do ER emergency operation in dental surgery simulation. Dentist Doctor Patients need proper dental care in ER surgery games. Emergency dentist has advised dental care & regular surgery clinic visits to become healthy in new dental games. Hey ER Doctor Dental Surgeon explore jaw disease & Dentist doctor simulator tools used in dentist surgery games. Be careful in doing dental surgery in operation games. Dentist Surgeon do not poke the emergency dentist games tools in patient‚Äôs face. You are expert emergency dentist in hospital simulation. Our 3D Doctor games is the best dentist Games. You will perform dentist surgeon duty as the city hospital‚Äôs dental clinic surgeon & take the patients to emergency room of doctor hospital clinic in time
In this 3D Dental games, some dentist doctor patients are waiting to get their dental surgery simulation in hospital games. Call the dental surgeon & anesthetist while you carry out the Dentist surgery in best ER doctor simulator. One of the patients had met with a bad accident in Hospital doctor games & need ER emergency doctor attention in City hospital games. Hey Emergency Dental Surgeon don‚Äôt forget to clean to avoid infection. This ER surgery games patient has a history of operation room surgery in dentist doctor surgeon games
ER Emergency Doctor Hospital Games Features:
‚Ä¢	Realistic Role Play of Emergency Dentist Doctor in 1st 3D Tooth Games
‚Ä¢	HD Hospital Emergency Room in Dentist Surgery Games
‚Ä¢	Treat Sick Patient as Dentist Hospital Manager in Doctor Games
Download 3D Dentist Surgery Simulator Game, the best Tooth Games Hospital Simulation Now!

Who ever designed this game obviously doesn't know anything about dentistry. The instrument used to clean teeth are scalers and cavitron; not an periosteal elevator. They don't even use that anymore. Do your research; or better yet go to the dentist.

title: Little Lovely Dentist
description:
Lot of people want to be a great dentist, it's your dream, yes? Now you get a chance to treat those poor patients at the clinic in this dentist game!

Director of the crazy dentist office is looking for a smart doctor who can clean, color and beautify teeth. Are you the best doctor?  Are you the best animal doctor?  

Welcome to dentist office, you have a chance to help your patients, to prove that you are a nice dentist! Gain experience to become the expert dentist and doctor. 

The dentist office is opening! Patients are lining up outside the little dentist office to check patients' teeth/tooth problems...  They suffer from kinds of teeth problems like bad teeth, tooth cavity, dental calculus, dentist mania...

Become the best crazy doctor, and the best dentist in town! Perform different treatments on your patients. Extract their teeth carefully without hurting them and see a tooth fairy swirl her magic wand. Treat patients at the office in this dentist games with pretty cool doctor tools like mouth spray, dental pliers and braces, dentist mania!  It's a very funny dentist game for people to practice, for creation, a sense of accomplishment! 

 Features:  
* More than 12 lovely characters in the dentist office, including celebrity, they have crazy teeth problems and are waiting for the little dentist
* Provide abundant teeth cleaning tools, color painting brush and kinds of lovely teeth stickers, and make you a little but crazy dentist 
* Featuring picture capturing and rating to let you see your work at the first moment. Dear little dentist, don't forget to take a picture after finishing your work 
* Not only a dentist mania game but also full of sense of education, make celebrities and develop habit of protecting teeth. It teaches you how to be a little dentist! 

Welcome to dentist mania, enjoy the lovely dentist games! Here you can help your patients, become a nice dentist! You can not only turn yourself into a professional dentist, diagnose and cure different patients, but also can operate and decorate your own dental clinic, make it your dreaming one. 

Hope you like this little dentist games, be the best dentist at this crazy fun office! Treat patients with professional doctor tools like syringes, dental tweezers, and more! This dentist‚Äôs office is so much fun! You‚Äôve never been to a dentist‚Äôs office like this! This dentist games will be improved continuously!

title: Children's doctor : dentist.
description:
Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist.¬†
We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic).¬†
In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets.
¬†
You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. After all, they all just need your help. For her, the animals will be grateful to you and very grateful.
¬†
Developing games for children, such as a veterinarian, contribute to the overall development of your child. They help to develop fine motor skills, coordination of movements, visual perception, attentiveness and observation, will show the baby how to treat animals, take care of them.
¬†
Our games for kids, such as a dentist, will teach them not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth, do not forget to clean them several times a day, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant pastime.
¬†
For the purpose of comprehensive development of the child, we create applications and educational games for children that are aimed to help boys and girls develop basic motor and other skills, and also have fun, fun and useful to spend their free time.
¬†
All you need is to download games, install and start playing, and in the future your child can choose one of the most needed professions in the world - the dentist
¬†
Be sure to visit our http://yovogames.com and also we are at:
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZruadkJJTuD4Bgb1F6pa3A
Twitter: https://twitter.com/YOVOstudio
Facebook: https://facebook.com/yovogames

comments: My 3-yr-old daughter LOVES this game. Very creative and really fun if you don't mind repeating the same 4 levels. There's one bug in the hippo level where it won't respond to action it's telling you to do, you have to work around it, but once you figure it out it's fine. The whole game is fun and i recommend

my toddler likes this game. there is nothing educational about it, it's just fun. but he was using it and the toothbrush the game required him to use disappeared and the process he made was gone because we had to start over. but it's really not a big deal because it doesn't ssve progress any way.

For a kids app the amount of adds is DISGUSTING! my child can not play without running to me every minute (IM SERIOUS) to get her back to her game. I let my daughter play games on the phone so I can do housework and she's not disturbing me but with this game (mind you without the adds) would be the greatest app) but because I'm getting disturbed every second I hate it

My toddler loves it and always goes back to this game. Only thing is they need more characters to play with (there is only 4). Also, there are ads in every kids games that are free. This one has lesser ad pop ups than other games we have played.
My 3 year old daughter LOVES this game!! I LOVE it because it teaches her not to be afraid of the dentist, and it shows what he/she Does to clean and take care of your teeth.

title: Medicine Dash - Hospital Time Management Game
description:
The most promising young doctor in town is you!

Dash through a busy ER in a renowned hospital and be efficient to use all your incredible healing skills to treat every single patient!

Live the dramatic routine of a medical resident who knows a lot about human anatomy and has a sanguine love for curing sickness!

Healthcare has never been so thrilling!

HIGHLIGHTS

üè•DASH to treat and cure every patient in many thrilling time management levels! Go rushing into the heat of a busy hospital ER and experience a medical routine not for the weak-hearted!

üè•WATCH your patients expressions closely like a true doctor should and be ready to treat them pronto!

üè•UPGRADE your medical gear with cutting-edge equipment and practice the art of medicine with fabulous efficiency!

üè•PROVE your medical skills in fun mini-games that will get you right into the heat of a young resident‚Äôs day-to-day tasks!

It doesn‚Äôt matter if a patient is just sneezing or if their whole body is turning grey: every single one of them deserves your medical attention!

If you really want to have your skills noticed in the best hospital in town, you‚Äôll have to show off your efficiency and skill at every opportunity.

A bright future in medicine awaits. Start your residency now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: HealthTap
description:
Get free answers and instant help from more than 140,000 top doctors on your phone or tablet. You can also pay for a virtual consult by video, voice, or text chat with a primary care doctor 24/7. HealthTap: Simple access to instant healthcare from real doctors.


HOW IT WORKS

SEARCH CONTENT from over 2.6 million doctor-answered questions and 700,000 topics and articles across over 850 conditions.

ASK A QUESTION for free to our network of 140,000 doctors and receive a brief, educational, confidential answer, usually within 24 hours.

ASSESS SYMPTOMS using Dr. A.I., the world‚Äôs leading, artificial intelligence-powered symptom checker and receive personalized recommendations and guidance to care.

SEE A DOCTOR immediately in real time by video, voice, or chat. You can also get prescriptions or make an appointment to see a doctor on your schedule.

GET A TREATMENT PLAN from a doctor with interactive Care Guides that include reminders and notifications, follow-ups, and referrals.

BUILD YOUR HEALTH PROFILE to collect all your health data in one place. This includes medical, treatments, prescriptions, labs, wearable devices, and doctor visit notes - and it all works together to provide a more personalized experience.

This app will ask for select permissions including location, network state, and system status to help offer you personalized, real-time health information. You can review the full list of Android permissions at: htap.us/2b8hh9/


WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

New York Times - ‚ÄúThe App That Saved 10,000 Lives‚Äù

PC Magazine - "The next time you have a medical question‚Ä¶ try asking the doctors on HealthTap."

Inc. - ‚ÄúHealthTap's diversity of patient tools sets it apart from competing tech companies.‚Äù

"Best application ever. Amazing to see top doctors volunteer their valuable time and expertise to give free useful tips on both medical and wellness topics. Huge thanks to these tens of thousands of super bright big hearted docs!"

"A social network at its best: 3 answers in 3 minutes from 3 doctors‚Ä¶."

"HealthTap literally saved my life! HealthTap is the one app you MUST have on your mobile device - just-in-case!"

title: Lybrate - Consult a Doctor
description:
Lybrate - Consult a Doctor is India's #1 Medical platform connecting over 10 million users to over 100,000 top Doctors and pathology labs. You can ask a FREE question about any health or fitness query and get multiple helpful answers from the best doctors within a few minutes. You can also find doctors across all major specialties and can either consult them online instantly or book an appointment to visit the clinic at your preferred time! Lybrate - Consult a Doctor has revolutionized the way people in India think about and take care of their health and fitness.

‚ú™ Among the World's Most Innovative Companies of 2016 in Healthcare by FastCompany ‚ú™
‚úØ Most Promising Start Up of the Year at VCCircle Healthcare Awards 2015 ‚úØ
‚ú™ Lybrate is Indian Medical Association's Digital Partner ‚ú™
 
\ Ask FREE Health Questions: Ask doctor your health or fitness related questions anonymously. Get answers to your health queries from qualified doctors within few minutes.

\ Book Appointments with Doctors: Find and book an appointment online with doctors. Find doctors online in Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Chennai, Kolkata, Pune, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chandigarh, and other major cities of India.

\ Consult Doctors Online: You can also consult doctors online privately in detail via text chat or audio/video call. Share medical records, lab test reports, past medical history.

\ Receive Health Tips: Get precious health tips and suggestions on a wide range of health issues from trusted doctors. Tips range from Ayurveda remedies to home remedies to clinical treatments to surgeries to diet plans to other fitness tips, etc. You can also choose to opt for a consultation with any particular doctor sending the tip.

\ Manage Medical Records: You don‚Äôt need to manage those messy paper medical/health records anymore. Click a photo and upload your documents on the cloud to access those anytime anywhere. You can also ask your doctor to upload the medical record and other records for you on Lybrate after the appointment.

\ Book Lab Tests: Now you can book home sample pickup for lab tests from NABL/CAP/ISO 9001 certified diagnostic labs like Metropolis, Quest Diagnostics, Thyrocare etc. Home pickup is available in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, Greater Noida, Faridabad, Ghaziabad, Mumbai, Bangalore, Pune and Hyderabad.

\ NEW - Buy health products curated by a panel of experts. 
 
Find Doctors in the following Specialties to consult online or to book an appointment:

Ear Nose and Tongue, Ayurveda, General Physician, Pediatrician, Dentist, Physiotherapist, Gastroenterologist, Cardiologist, Dietitian-Nutritionist, Endocrinologist, Ophthalmologist, Dermatologist, Gynaecologist/Gynecologist, Sexologist, And More.
 
Doctors on Lybrate have answered millions of questions and attended to hundreds of thousands of patient appointments to help with the following problems:

\ Skin Care, Pimples, Acne or Rashes on Skin
\ Erectile Dysfunction, Premature Ejaculation, Safe Sex, Irregular Periods
\ Mental Health, Stress, Anxiety, Depression
\ Stress, Headache, Migraine, Sinus Allergy
\ Pregnancy Symptoms, Breastfeeding, Childcare, Parenting, Period Trackers, My Periods
\ Diabetes, Hypertension, Heartburn, Fitness
\ Child Obesity, Thyroid Problem, Lose Weight, Baby Calendar
\ Back Pain, Injury, Arthritis or General Question
\ Cold, Cough, Swine Flu, Viral Fever, Dengue, Acidity
 
Lybrate is also available on the web for you to consult doctors online or book an appointment with them: https://www.lybrate.com
 
We'd love to hear from you. Questions, comments or ideas on how to improve the app? Drop us a line at hello@lybrate.com or tweet us @Lybrate.

Lybrate doctor discovery service is currently only available for doctors in India. We‚Äôre growing quickly - so if we're not in your country yet, check back soon!

title: MBBS Doctor
description:
Writing a prescription is one of the most important part for a doctor. If you can diagnose a disease by your clinical knowledge but can't remember the treatment / management plan,still you can easily remember the treatment protocol by this app. It is a free medical apps for you. So don't worry about the forgetfulness.

MBBS Doctors or MD doctors from all over the world will get more benefit from this free medical apps. It will be the best free medical apps in your need.

Features:
1. Subject wise treatments are categorized. For example Medicine, Surgery , Gynae, Eye, ENT etc.
2. Arranged the treatment protocol easily.
3. All the subjects like medicine, surgery , gynae, eye, ENT, emergency etc are clickable and you can easily go to the respective topics easily.
4. You can get the different topics in each subject. For example Medicine have COPD, asthma, MI, stroke etc. 
5. All the topics in each subject also clickable. So you can easily navigate to the descriptions of each.
6. We have also added the search option in each subject to find out any topics easily.
7. We have also add eye soothing  green color background.
More features coming soon...

title: Ambulance Simulator - Car Driving Doctor
description:
Rescue innocent and injured people in the city with the all-new ambulance driving simulator. Save people from traffic collisions, burning buildings, bank robbery attempts gone wrong, and more to help them make a full recovery at the city hospital. Become the number one lifesaver in the best doctor car driving simulators!

!! Ambulance Simulator - Car Driving Doctor is a new open world driving simulator !!

Sound real ambulance sirens and drive fast through city streets past busy rush hour traffic to rescue injured people. Jump out of your ambulance to perform first aid like applying bandages, using defibrillators, giving medicine, all to help stabilize the patient. Help the patient safely onto the stretcher and into the ambulance, it's now time to get them back to the city hospital on time and safely.

Drive your ambulance safely when you're transporting the patient, any bump or crash can injure the person more and put them in more danger. Blast the ambulance sirens when driving so everyone in the city knows you're coming, get to the city hospital as fast as you can.

Example of missions:
- Help victims of traffic collisions
- Assist firefighters with victims of burning buildings
- Perform real medical procedures on injured people
- Use items like bandages, syringes, first aid kits, and defibrillators 
- Escort patients through the city back to the hospital
- Transport patients on stretchers to and from the ambulance.
- Drive quickly to get injured people  

Upgrade and unlock new ambulances by saving more people in the city. With realistic simulator driving, experience ambulance driving like no other game on the market. Authentic lights and sounds make the hospital doctor experience better than ever. Explore the huge open world city environment in your ambulance or exit your vehicle at any time in new first-person gameplay for the ultimate first aid simulation.

Realistic car driving and first-person open-world gameplay bring you the ultimate city doctor driving simulator.  Rescue injured patients and transport them to the hospital in real ambulances for one of the best driving simulations, Ambulance Simulator - Car Driving Doctor.

title: Doctor Hospital Operation Time Management Game
description:
This time we have come up with your favourite hospital dash game. In this hospital game, we have covered lots of hospital activities like general hospital check ups and treatments, dental hospital check ups and treatments & surgery hospital for legs and hands. You can enjoy three gameplay areas in a single fun hospital game. The free dash game involves different rewards and daily challenges to tighten your gameplay experience. The patients keep coming with their problems and you are the only one who can nurse them in this health care game. Manage your time as a doctor and work fast to diagnose, treat and cure all those who need treatments in this hospital simulation game. You need to manage hospital in this crazy time management game that is full of medical treatments and professional medical tools. Learn how to be a multi-tasking doctor and pay attention to different things at the same time in the doctor game. You need to train your fingers to be fast, make decisions quickly and keep every patient happy in this addictive game. So what are you waiting for guys? There are so many patients waiting for you to be treated. Cure all the patients and unlock all different hospital of this hospital simulation game.

Enjoy hospital shop game that include different activities like giving injection, applying healing cream, treating different surgery, dressing bandage, giving pills, measuring blood pressure and pulse & many more. For better treatments in medical clinic game, you have to upgrade your hospital and pursue a medical career from a medical student to the senior doctor. 

# Key Features

- Become a doctor to cure lots of patients in surgery game
- Serve patients using different medicines and equipments
- Unlock different hospitals for variety of treatments
- Different hospitals for the variety of play areas
- Number of upgrades to increase the treatment speed
- Handle so many patients in this diagnose game
- Use number of awesome power up to excite the gameplay
- Complete daily challenge and earn rewards
- Get unexpected daily rewards during the play area
- Certain goals have to be achieved to complete the level
- Upgrade the tools to perform faster for better treatment game experience

In hospital simulator game have more fun, more patients, more treatments. Let‚Äôs play hospital doctor game where you need to manage customers and maintain own health care centre. Let‚Äôs download hospital simulator and show your medical and time management talent. 

# Got any problems or suggestions?‚Ä®

- Please Send A Message.‚Ä®
- We Are Always Happy About Our Players‚Äô Feedback!‚Ä®

title: Doctor Dash : Hospital Game
description:
Hey Doctor, Build your hospital empire and diagnose, treat and cure the diseases of your patients in this Doctor Dash Hospital Game.
 This is your hospital explore it and give best treatment to your patients in this doctor game you will be having a multispecialty hospital game where there will be having different clinic for each disease. It looks like a kid‚Äôs game but it‚Äôs not. In this hospital game you have to manage and upgrade different clinics that are mention below with is the core of this Doctor Dash Hospital Game.
Clinics and Doctor:
‚Ä¢	Lungs clinic which has Lungs disease specialist doctors.
‚Ä¢	Kidney specialist doctors
‚Ä¢	Dental care clinic
‚Ä¢	Heart disease cure center doctor
‚Ä¢	Neurosurgeons for brain clinic
You will get a realistic hospital feel in this Doctor Dash Hospital Game with different clinics and treatments. In this doctor game you will get an X-ray room too to diagnose disease better and perfect and can suggest a patient if they require a surgery or operation or they can be treated by medicine only.
In this time management game patients will keep coming so here is the good news you have a nurse to assist you in this Doctor Dash Hospital Game and she is the one who will help them back to health! Manage your time with your busy nurse and work fast to diagnose, treat and cure all those in need of your skills. In this Doctor Dash Hospital Game you will get a wheel chair also to serve critical patients and reception desk to help you best. Be prepared for emergency situations where you have little time to save lives! Make crucial decisions; combine the best medicine and all kinds of other medical procedures on your patients. In this multilevel Doctor Dash Hospital Game you can unlock various features in this doctor game at various levels. Design, expand and build it to make it bigger, upgrade and decorate it to make it prettier, staff and manage it to make it the best hospital ever.

title: Ask a Doctor
description:
Instant answers from Doctors, 24x7.  ‚ÄúAsk a Doctor‚Äù app allows you to write your health query, attach a picture or your latest lab report and post to doctors across the world in just a few taps. Your answer arrives in minutes  thanks to our 15,000+ strong doctor network spread across geographies and time zones. You also get FREE health tips from our doctors every now and then!
 
HealthcareMagic is the world leader in connecting users and doctors across the world. It is used by employees of top organizations like Akamai, Airbus, BMW, Lenovo, McAfee, SAP, Vodafone and many more across the globe.  We now bring the same world class service to all our online users through ‚ÄúAsk a Doctor‚Äù app. So what are you waiting for?


 
Highlights:
 
* Upload reports or images with your questions
* Ask follow-ups
* Over 15,000 doctors from across the globe
* 100+ Doctors online at any given time
* Specialists span over 50 specialties including alternative medicine
* Over a million answers so far
* Receive FREE Health tips from our Doctors

recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: A complete rip of. It gives you an option to ask just one question, but it doesn't allow you to select it. Then it tries to sign you up for a subscription. What a joke! Whatever happened to just trying to help people and make better better without trying to rip them off? You can kiss my white ass. The Medical Field is the new "Gold Rush" where doctors no longer care about helping others.

I forgot my password, so I put in my email address to receive a temporary password. When I went back to the site, there was no place to put the new password. It just brings you back to the same sign-in window that asks "forgot your password?". Then round and round you go.

I received 4 emails, each a few minutes after the other saying that if I downloaded the app I could ask a question for free, instead before I could even ask a question I got hit with a monthly subscription paywall before I could even ask my question, 90% sure this is probably some kind of scam at this point

They are mailed me " With our Android and iOS products, you can ask your question and get your answer for free! Download our app now and get the answer to that medical question that is bothering you." But after installing they want 35$

Crashes when i try to pay via PayPal... no further info. It spontaneously exited when i clicked "Report a problem." It somehow turned on OneTouch through Paypal, which is maybe normal but maybe a bit sketchy. The web site is just as unreliable. Scared me away.

description:
Ice princess become pregnant and she needs your help in her pregnancy period to parenthood. Because there are a lot of patients in the hospital. She needs your help for her pregnancy test to identify that she is pregnant or not? Her diet care to keep her baby healthy. Baby delivery surgery simulator. A new baby sister or baby brother can be after delivery surgery simulator. A baby care babycenter is also available for newborn baby sister and baby brother.

*** Ice princess pregnant mommies selection

***  Newborn baby sister's nursery!

title: Dream Hospital - Health Care Manager Simulator
description:
Get on the board of the city multispeciality hospital and medical centre and become a hospital tycoon! We want to welcome the new health care manager of this hospital simulator: YOU! Plan, manage and coordinate our hospital staff and turn yourself into a professional manager and the star doctor of this clinic! 

Our hospital doors are always open. No matter the time, the emergency room of any health care clinic needs to be prepared for anything, this is a real hospital simulation game!. Become the best manager by looking after different kinds of ill patients with the best doctors and nurses and manage the finances of the health care departments: Provide life-saving care, hire staff, invest in complex medical equipment and manage business issues and health compliances to assure the quality of the service: This is a real medical management simulation! Your decisions will affect the entire health care system!

Sew your patients as a genuine surgeon expert in hearts medicine. They may need one or two point of your funny stiching. Cure a dream walker in this hospital simulator, become the owner of your medical centre and manage to master all the free hospital games!

- Construct real treatment, diagnostic and emergency rooms and become a hospital tycoon!
- Research for medicine and new medication treatments and operation technologies to have a healthy game
- Produce various cures and medicine to treat diseases and injuries as in the best doctor and health games
- Earn good reputation planning your strategy and healing your ill patients with the best staff and medical equipment.
- Heal every illness and injuries at the surgery operation room or deploy other treatments in these medical games.
- At the pharmacy a nurse will give sick people a remedy for their disease
- Compete with other hospitals in the city, enjoy this clinic game
- Send out your ambulance fleet to cure and heal more people
- Great mix of theme hospital manager, doctors, nurses caring and healing simulation

BECOME THE BEST HOSPITAL MANAGER IN FREE HOSPITAL GAMES WITH THE FUNNIEST DOCTOR GAMES
Build medical care rooms with doctors and nurses to provide ill patients with best treatment and medicine in this game hospital. Manage and hire handymen staff to keep the facility clean.

HEALTH QUALITY AND HOSPITAL SETTINGS IN THESE MANAGEMENT GAMES
Design your health center with strategy to make it bigger and make it the best hospital ever! Put yourself in a position of a real manager. Think like you are not playing doctor games but running a real hospital staff and management problems.
Hire the best doctors, nurses, meds and medical equipment so they can cure patients in pain, diagnose a pregnancy, heal injuries or strong fever or even research new heart medication. After the diagnostic tests, a nurse will heal the patient's disease with pills and medicine.

KEEP YOUR PATIENTS HAPPY IN THESE HOSPITAL GAMES
Build advanced medical tools, xray equipment and emergency rooms in your health center to provide sick people with a complete medical health care facility. Hire nice doctors, surgeons and nurses to comfort people during their stay and send out your ambulance for emergencies.
The theme hospital caring and healing simulation will surely appeal to the ones searching nursing, doctor and hospital games!

Compete with other theme hospitals in your city and achieve the best hospital on the simulation games of nurse games!. Plan your strategy and earn the highest reputation as a manager by building the most efficient, beautiful and pleasant health center in the city!

Our hospital games are free to play, though some in-game items can be purchased for real money.
---
Like our hospital simulator game on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/dreamhospitalgame/

If you have any question regarding these simulation games, please contact us:
support@yboga.com

This game requires connection to the Internet on the device in order to work properly.

comments: It's a great time waster, it's been well thought out and it is very good theme hospital upgrade. However, I seem to have a bug. title: My Hospital: Doctor Game
description:
Manage your own hospital in this crazy time management game that is full of action, fun mini games and professional medical tools. Learn how to be a multi-tasking doctor and pay attention to different things at the same time. Warm up your fingers, make decisions quickly and keep every patient happy.  

First, assign patients correctly depending on what the speech bubble shows. Then begin treating them as fast as possible within the time limit. Some medical tools and equipment have to be combined, for some of them you should perform different moves, while others will need you to play a mini game. Enjoy playing doctor mini games that include popping the bubbles in an injection, setting up an infusion, treating a burn, dressing a bandage, getting rid of earwax, making pills, measuring blood pressure and pulse. For better treatments, you have to upgrade your hospital and pursue a medical career from a medical student to the senior doctor.

Diagnose, treat and cure your patients quickly to nurse them back to health. Good luck, doctor!

Features:
‚Ä¢ doctor game for people of all ages
‚Ä¢ time management challenges
‚Ä¢ train management skills and make fast decisions
‚Ä¢ earn coins and diamonds to upgrade the hospital
‚Ä¢ a lot of medical tools and doctor mini games with variations

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml

title: Virtual Hospital Family Doctor Surgeon Emergency
description:
The 3d virtual doctor is a new innovative and a real family doctor game with amazing gameplay environment and controls you would love to play just like other medical games. In this game you play the role of a doctor that conduct the treatment of patients with various diseases. 
The virtual hospital doctor games is based on a real life of a doctor in which you just have to work as the virtual doctor to operate the patients by identifying there disease and start the treatment. As the patient come to the emergency care centers on rescue ambulance the hospital duty is to check the previous medial record of the patient and forward those to the suitable doctor for better treatment and then your roles start as a doctor. You are provided with various tool to find the either the symptoms of the disease of patient on daily basis or as emergency doctor to deal with patients injured during some accidents occurs in city rescue by the ambulance such as 911 operators. This ambulance rescue the patient and point hospital that is the nearest one and take it into the emergency.

This doctor simulator game contains the different skill levels of the doctor. The doctor skill level increase as he perform the patient treatment successfully. First you with low skill level only treat the patient on regular basis and as the level increases you need to deal with the patients with more critical health conditions in emergency rooms and also have to perform various operations like heart surgeries, liver transplant and critical wound treatments. As the level increases you are awarded with various rewards and bonuses.
 
Gameplay 

First the patient come to the doctor hospital the emergency hospital staff categorize the patient as for the regular checkup or emergency if patient wants regular checkup he has to wait for his turn. You as a doctor examine the patient and on the basis of the symptoms identify the disease the patient has and start the disease treatment by suggesting them either medicines or further tests.

In emergency situations you need to quickly respond try to heal the wounds in a given time and perform operations by following the time limits beware if any step goes wrong or times out the patient may die which can affect the game points or may decrease in level . AS the level of your game increase different category of operations and tools will be unlocked.

Features

‚Ä¢	Realistic environment with amazing graphics and easy controls 
‚Ä¢	Endless missions and tons of patients are waiting for you
‚Ä¢	Various operation and treatment tools
‚Ä¢	Play as a specialized doctor and save life‚Äôs
‚Ä¢	Intuitive easy to uses user interface

Download now and don't forget to give us your feedback

title: Reanimation inc: Realistic Indie Medical Simulator
description:
Many games claim to be a realistic simulation of some real-life experiences, however, this medical simulator indeed is. You‚Äôll only find ill patients lying in an ER and many yet unknown medical equipment all around. It‚Äôs up to you ‚Äì whether the patient survives or dies on your hands. 
At the start, you will have to complete an intern test full of realistic medical questions to prove that you are worthy to be allowed to patients. 
Alright! Now, when you are ready, hurry up to get in time for your first patient! What diseases does a person have? Is it a stroke or a rare illness that has similar symptoms? Try not to mess up with drugs ‚Äì wrong medicine can kill a patient!
It is a custom in our games that after a short tutorial, you are on your own ‚Äì there are no shining buttons telling you what to push, nor there are loot boxes with wonderful prizes every hour or so. If you are a good doctor and your patients are regularly make it to a hospital, you‚Äôll collect money for new medical equipment fast, however, no one is going to pay you anything, if you only bring dead bodies to a pathologist.
Game Features:
 üè• Realistic and unique gameplay ‚Äì this simulator was created in close collaboration with professional ambulance doctors, paramedics, and EMT. The point was to demonstrate first aid basics in a fun and entertaining way. Of course, it is simplified, so that not only interns, ordinators and doctors would be able to enjoy it.
 üè• Offline Game + Low Storage Requires ‚Äì many games these days require an internet connection to be played, however, our games are always focused to deliver great gameplays on even cheap phones with low storage and other system requirements. Enjoy ;-)
 üè• 3d Graphics ‚Äì in this simulation game every detail is realised in 3d in order to 
 üè• Educating game ‚Äì playing this game you will learn functioning technics to help people in need around you. Probably, when the time comes, you be able to save somebody‚Äôs life! Every patient generates randomly, you won‚Äôt be able to learn them by their names and expect to treat them the same way in order to save their lives!
- Crew Progressing ‚Äì the better you become with the diagnosis the more money you earn per every call, which means more equipment for you and even more difficult cases!


üë®üèª‚Äç‚öïÔ∏èGame Progression:üë©üèª‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è
 
At first, you are just another intern with no real experience and a small number of drugs and medical equipment, your goal, of course, will be to reanimate a patient. Time is limited; however, it‚Äôs your choice, whether you should take a patient to a hospital immediately, or you can handle the case your self if you feel like you are dr House or dr Cox today.
Anyway, get your scrubs straight and try to focus on symptoms: how high is the blood pressure, does the patient breathes, what is the body temperature? Try to analyze, what is the state of the medical emergency and get the right medicines for the case. Do you know why adrenaline is required for this treatment, or what you should use in stroke or exacerbation of COPD? The game has a huge amount of drugs for all occasions! You will have to learn and master the emergency doctor crew knowledge in our medical simulator game in order to be able to perform an operation and save the patient - there won't be a pretty nurse around to do it for you! Just don't mess up a stroke with a plague...

 Now when you can tell organs from one another, an ekg monitor from a vaccine and an adrenaline shot from a defibrillator, we can only wish you a good luck, doctor!

summary: Game's hardcore gameplay was designed by professional ambulance & ER doctors.
recentChanges: cloud saves and exam answers added!
comments: Good little game. I understand its not 100% accurate but it is still nice to a student studying paramedicine. If you could just add some more options for diagnosis to stop things getting confusing? For example, V-Tac is not V-fib, and PEA is not a diagnosable option even though it occurs in the game. Apart from that, maybe some more vitals taking options? Or maybe that comes later im the game. Anyway, good app, helps pass the time

Educational, entertaining, and realistic. This game is one of a kind for sure, it's difficult, and requires actual medical knowledge, which is provided in the game. It's fun for people looking to gain knowledge, while having fun doing so. In further updates I would like to see, more medications and dilemmas, more realistic and complex character stories, add a female model to match when your patient is a female (this will allow you to actually connect with your patient, increasing the pressure)

Kinda good but kind bad. I think. For the good points, 1. You do hv to know the basic biological knowledge to play the game, which makes me to study biology more (as a high school student) 2. It will test you if u read the passage or not (the ‚Äútest‚Äù in the game is very funny) hahaa. But there is always something to be complained. 1. It's so messy during the gameplay, lots of control but no tutorial (actually is there are a tutorial or I skipped it?) And I don't really know the words. Hahaha

Interesting idea but it gives too much information too soon too fast and too much at one time. All the same I enjoy information games and even though it is not intended to be a complete legal representation for a real life situation it does give information about how anatomy works. I would enjoy seeing future updates to this game

Love the game its extremely satisfying to save a life how ever I agree with a few of the other reviews it's really slow u dont get enough money for the missions. On top of that it doesn't change much with each mission it's really repetitive. I've bought game dollars and still can't afford everything needed to progress faster. Also when u diagnose a patient it says that the diagnosis is wrong if u only select one injuries or not enough injuries I think maybe a partial score would be fair.

title: Surgeon Doctor 2018 : Virtual Job Sim
description:
Save the world one patient at a time!

Time to be a hero. Real Heroes wear white cloaks! Play a nifty, genius surgeon in this surgery simulator. This is your chance to perform difficult surgery operations in the hospital. You are one of the best surgeons in town and it‚Äôs your duty to take urgent care of your patients now. Perform a variety like appendix surgery, kidney stone removal surgery, scoliosis surgery and many more! Use efficient surgery equipment like scalpel, retractor, scissors, stitching needles and many more available in your toolbox! Remember to sterilize your equipment after usage.

In addition to your large array of tools, operate to alleviate different unique injuries. Cuts, scrapes, and fractures from car accidents, cooking, glass, or disease. Deal with different body parts such as broken arms and legs, nose and back surgeries--and more! Use high-tech professional equipment like defibrillators and computers. Test your skills as a professional surgeon; treat patients and make them healthy and happy again! Perform challenging tasks every time. People‚Äôs lives are in your hands! The nurses and patients are all counting on you!


Surgeon Doctor 2018: Virtual Job Sim Features:
Smooth and seamless animation with HD graphics
Experience the most realistic surgery simulations 
Live the life of a professional surgeon 
Wide range of instruments, tools and supplies

Really addictive gameplay

Test your skills as a professional surgeon; treat patients and make them healthy and happy again! Perform challenging tasks every time. People‚Äôs lives are in your hands! The nurses and patients are all counting on you!


Surgeon Doctor 2018: Virtual Job Sim Features:
Smooth and seamless animation with HD graphics
Experience the most realistic surgery simulations
Live the life of a professional surgeon
Wide range of instruments, tools and supplies
Simple and intuitive controls
Really addictive gameplay


About Tap2Play
Tap2Play, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Tapinator, Inc.
Tapinator (Ticker: TAPM) develops and publishes games on mobile platforms. The Company‚Äôs portfolio includes over 300 mobile gaming titles that, collectively, have achieved over 450 million player downloads. Tapinator is headquartered in New York. For more info, visit Tapinator.com.

comments: This game is not good I do not recommend. There are few levels, even though you were showed how to do the surgerys they walk you through every level, before you wipe the open wounds with the alcohol wipes and there is still blood, it looks like someone just took a red marker and started to draw on the "victim". Many more poor things with the game.
The game is cool and all but there's only 11 levels/ operations , then the Game is over. And most of them are pretty basic like emergency room injuries.

I've noticed in some "surgeries" a patient may experience heart failure which is when the heart valve grows weak enough it can either stop pumping blood to your lungs or stop pumping oxygenrich blood to the rest of your body, so then the game ask you to give cardiac arrest. From the research I have conducted I'm pretty sure your not supposed to stop the heart while it fails. Just some common knolwedge from a 12 year old. Whoever made this game obviously didn't do their homework.

This game sucks. It starts off okay, but then it just keeps holding your hand through every level, telling you step by step how to do everything up until you finish the whole game 5 minutes later. It needs vast improvement. You should be able to pick the items you want to treat the patient with. And there are annoying advertisements after each 20 second surgery you complete. It needs much more development before it sees the light of day.

This game was aight.But the nurse telling the doc wat to do & according to the story line the doc is one of the best surgeon around that area,this doesn't make any sense.oh I get,may be the doc is a junior intern ,like the best junior intern who needs help from a senior nurse üòÇ.

title: MDLIVE: Talk to a Doctor 24/7
description:
Have an MDLIVE virtual doctor visit with board-certified physicians from the comfort and convenience of your own home or from wherever you are, whenever you want ‚Äì nights, after hours, weekends and holidays.

MDLIVE also offers behavioral health appointments with licensed therapists and board-certified psychiatrists as well as dermatology services.

You can schedule an appointment at a time and day that's convenient for you or have an on-demand visit in around 15 minutes.

All MDLIVE doctors are board-certified and state-licensed, with an average of 15+ years of experience. MDLIVE has two National Committee for Quality Assurance certifications and is accredited by the American Telemedicine Association. MDLIVE doctors are also friendly, caring, compassionate, and experts in conducting virtual medical consultations. And best of all, 9 out of 10 people would recommend us to their friends and family members in need of a doctor visit.

Great reasons to use MDLIVE virtual doctors:
1.	You‚Äôre not feeling up to leaving home
2.	You want to avoid the high cost of Urgent Care or the ER
3.	Your doctor isn‚Äôt available
4.	It's after hours, the weekend or a holiday
5.	You need a short-term refill on a prescription
6.	It‚Äôs hard to get to the doctor‚Äôs office
7.	You don‚Äôt want to take time off work or be away from home
 

MDLIVE doctors treat over 50 non-emergency medical conditions like these:
‚Ä¢ Allergies
‚Ä¢ Bronchitis
‚Ä¢ Colds & Flu
‚Ä¢ Ear Pain
‚Ä¢ Fever
‚Ä¢ Migraines
‚Ä¢ Pink Eye
‚Ä¢ Rash 
‚Ä¢ Sinus Infections
‚Ä¢ Sore Throat
‚Ä¢ Urinary Tract Infections (Female, 18+)
‚Ä¢ And more‚Ä¶

We also offer treatment and support for a wide variety of behavioral health issues:
‚Ä¢ Addictions
‚Ä¢ Anxiety
‚Ä¢ Bipolar Disorder
‚Ä¢ Couples Therapy
‚Ä¢ Depression
‚Ä¢ Eating Disorders
‚Ä¢ LGBTQ Support
‚Ä¢ Panic Disorders
‚Ä¢ Postpartum Depression
‚Ä¢ Relationships
‚Ä¢ Social Anxiety
‚Ä¢ Stress Management
‚Ä¢ PTSD (Post-traumatic Stress Disorder)
‚Ä¢ And more

We treat thousands of people a day with many different conditions, but you should not use MDLIVE if you are experiencing a medical emergency. In addition, we don't treat sexually transmitted diseases, urinary tract infections in males, or urinary tract infections in females under 18 years of age. Children under 3 with a fever and children under 12 with ear pain cannot be treated by MDLIVE.


Copyright ¬© 2020 MDLIVE, Inc. All Rights Reserved. 

MDLIVE may not be available in certain states and is subject to state regulations.  MDLIVE does not replace the primary care physician, is not an insurance product, and may not be able to substitute for traditional in-person care in every case or for every condition. 
MDLIVE does not guarantee patients will receive a prescription, does not prescribe DEA controlled substances and may not prescribe non-therapeutic drugs and certain other drugs which may be harmful because of their potential for abuse. 
MDLIVE and the MDLIVE logo are registered trademarks of MDLIVE, Inc. and may not be used without written permission. For complete terms of use visit www.mdlive.com/terms-of-use

recentChanges: Performance improvements and bug fixes.
comments: This app is terrible. It takes forever to generate an appointment, then will continuously tell you there is an error but not where the error generated from, leaving users to continuously try to re-enter information over and over with no success/ access to an appointment. I wish my company would return to Dr. On Demand, that app is easy and painless.

I usually don't rate app, but this one is really ridiculous. It won't even let me log in, either using fingerprint or password, because it the app thinks that I'm not connected to the internet. If I'm not connected, why are all the apps on my phone working and online with no problem? My phone is connected, both on Wi-Fi, or data, but this joke of an app doesn't even recognize it. Please hire some real Android developers who know what they're doing.

After attempting to create an account for 60 minutes due to issues with the system having issues verifying my insurance info or whatever, the app says it'll be over 2 hours to speak to a doctor. Yes Covid-19.. Delays delays. Still signing up sucked majorly. I tried the website, calling the 888 number, the walgreens app and finally the mdlive app to sign up. All options had issues.

Was recommended to use the service by my insurance provider. Called them up, went thru registration, installed the app, confirmed the appointment wait under 15 minutes. 3 hours later STILL waiting. Spoke to a health service specialist at 2 hours who told me the next available time to schedule a video appointment; because thats the only way in my state to use the service, was 11 1/2 hours later! What a joke! I could have went to a walk in clinic. I'm done. Uninstalled- waste of time.

I cant even discribe how wonderful this is! Ive had an on going issue for a little while now. Time and money is a struggle, I just used this for the 1st time and received the prescription ive been needing within 5 minutes. Im so thrilled. Im overjoyed and i have a sense of relief . Thank you so much

title: Kids Doctor: Dentist
description:
Everybody likes when people smile to each other. Smiles make us happy. Person need to take care of teeth regularly, to make our smiles beautiful. You need to brush teeth few times a day. When your teeth get ill, you need to visit a special doctor. Dentist takes care of teeth. Today our beloved Hippy will get to know with you what tasks has dentist every day. Kids Hippo hospital is open to everybody! Let‚Äôs meet adventures. Our kids hospital is waiting for its dentist. It waits for you!

Every person knows that dentist works with problems connected with teeth. How many tooth problems do you know? Today we will learn about it. Kids Hippo Hospital explains to you, what dentist has to do. Today we will learn how to drill teeth, remove unhealthy caries, set filling, fight a bad breath, give a shot, fight bad microbes and just how to brush teeth. Don‚Äôt think that setting a filling is such an easy task. There are a lot of preparatory and exciting tasks before. Our kids Hippo Hospital will tell you about it and about many other interesting facts. Help Hippo to become a dentist. Have fun and learn a bit, playing our kids educational games.

This new game, like all our games for boys and girls is absolutely for free! Stay tuned, follow Hippo and make your children happy playing with them our kids educational games!

title: The Throat Doctor - Ent DR in this fun free game
description:
Do you know just how many bugs and bacteria there are in one person's mouth? There's all kinds of icky things behind your teeth! Time for the Throat Doctor to get to work!

With the Throat Doctor, you can learn that it's all in a day's work for a doctor - it's a fun throat doctor simulation game where you play the role of doctor, treating patients to clear up all the nasty infections they find and make them all better!

Ease your fears with this fun, simple, cute game - no patient ever leaves the Throat Doctor's practice without a smile on their face!

So, put on your doctor's coat, wash your hands, and get ready to have fun!

Key features:

Welcome your patients to your practice, sit them in the examination chair and ask them to OPEN WIDE!

‚Ä¢ Find all the infections - aim your flashlight to the back of your patient's throat to light up all the nasties!

‚Ä¢ The right tool for the right job - each different infection, virus and bacteria needs a different medical tool to get rid of it. Make sure you use the right tools for the job or those bugs aren't going to budge!

‚Ä¢ Cooling freeze gun - blow them away with the ice-cold spray!

‚Ä¢ Soothing cream - bring those infections down to size with the tube of ointment!

‚Ä¢ Mouth vacuum - suck out the stubborn bacteria with the awesome hand vacuum!

‚Ä¢ Don't forget the back - fish out the bugs hiding in the back of the throat with the trusty swab!

‚Ä¢ Bring down the swelling - Q-tip those inflamed tonsils with medicine to reduce the swelling!

‚Ä¢ Pick out the junk - use the tweezers to tease out the toothpicks. Toothpicks? How did they get in there!?

‚Ä¢ Polish to perfection - clean the gums, teeth and lips when you're done with the antiseptic wipe to make your patients leave with the widest, brightest, shiniest of smiles! So many cool tools to use!

With this fantastic throat doctor simulation game, you will love playing doctors while learning that there's nothing to worry about when it's their turn to OPEN WIDE!

title: My City Hospital Life: Pretend Doctors Lifestyle
description:
My City Hospital Life is a clinic roleplay game where you can perform pretend activities in virtual hospital and can manage stuff and buy snacks, medicine and dress up staff and patients. An imaginative & open ended simulator with role play activities in 2019 where you can play as doctor, nurse, patients and other medical staff members. Show your extraordinary imagination to make choices in multiple stories as you like. Roam around in the hospital rooms to explore different department rooms and labs. You will love this hospital role play game for girls and boys which is available free offline.

Little boys and girls who like to enjoy their free time in family home, will have unique entertaining time playing My City Hospital Life, Let‚Äôs fulfil our life long dream of working in a medical center. Explore the open world game play by visiting clinic reception, patient wards and experiment labs. Arrange, manage and complete creative activities in each patient room as you like. Dump trash, dress up medical character as you wish. Make and create your own avatar as you like it to be being the pro designer. 

You can take medical appointments from reception and then can visit the specialist doctor. Change bed sheets and patients clothes from multiple selection and remove garbage from hospital floors. Prepare healthy diet for patients and feed them medicine. Feeling hungry no worries! Explore the open cafeteria in the hospital. Grab snacks and juice making. In this pretend play games for boys and girls you can perform complete body test of autistic patients with many entertaining duties. Best ASMR game with oddly satisfying game play. Now play this fun town game and have adventure time.  

 My City Hospital Life features:

-	Explore the local Hospital & Clinics as a nurse or patient, and start off in the lobby!
-	Interact and play with everything from the lobby TV, Aquarium and Check-in desk.
-	Take a seat or grab a snack, and head over to the various rooms inside this hospital!
-	Check the heart monitor, and take care of the patients as Doctor and Nurse.
-	Make a feast for lunch in the Cafeteria
-	Explore the Hospital Lab, and become a creative genius!

Open ended play with no goals, or restrictions

title: Teladoc
description:
A DOCTOR‚ÄôS CARE. ANYTIME. ANYWHERE.
Teladoc¬Æ connects you with a board-certified doctor 24/7/365 through the convenience of phone or video consults. Within minutes, a doctor will contact you ready to listen and resolve your issue. If medically necessary a prescription will be sent to your pharmacy of choice. 

* It‚Äôs healthcare when and wherever you want it!

Teladoc doctors can diagnose, recommend treatment and prescribe medication, if medically necessary, for many medical issues, including:
- Sore throat and stuffy nose 
- Allergies 
- Cold and flu symptoms 
- Bronchitis 
- Poison ivy 
- Pink eye 
- Respiratory infection 
- Sinus problems 
- Ear infection 
And more‚Ä¶

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Request a consult ‚Äì Open the Teladoc App and request a consult, provide medical history and pay for the consult. Your Teladoc account is also available online at Teladoc.com or toll-free at 1-800-Teladoc.

Talk to a doctor ‚Äì Within minutes, a state-licensed doctor reviews your medical history and contacts you via phone or video. Teladoc consults have no time limit; you can speak to the doctor for as long as you‚Äôd like. 

Pick up prescription ‚Äì The doctor discusses the issue with you, answers questions and recommends next steps.  If medically necessary, a prescription can be submitted to a local pharmacy of your choice.

HOW DO I GET TELADOC? 
Teladoc is a service provided to you as a benefit through your employer, health insurance, or other organization.  Visit Teladoc.com to learn more. 

This app allows Teladoc members to:
- Authenticate your Teladoc account.
- Talk to a doctor, anytime, anywhere.
- Create and update your medical history.
- Update personal, contact, login and billing information.

Thanks guys, for your quick, efficient, and effective app!

The funny thing is they even lost my visit hostory. Why doesnt allow users update their new insurance plan? Why you need create the whole profile when somebody switch to a different plan? It doesnt make sense at all.

This app was recommended to me by a co-worker. Said it was great and they usually respond within 15 minutes. I have been waiting for 3 1/2 hours....I can't go to my PCP, Urgent Care, or ER unless I am dying or "have severe difficulty breathing". So, I thought I would give Teladoc a try. I have been doing home care for 6 days now and not getting better. I guess I have to suffer longer and get worse in order to get help. I am very disappointed and would not recommend this app. üò∑

More of an issue with the service than the app. Requested appt, then kept getting texts and robocalls from "SPAM likely" number, saying "The Doctor is ready to see you. Please enter the waiting room." App was already running and I was already in the waiting room, and had been all day. Message at the top said I was still in queue WAITING to see Doc. Only thing I see is my cam image. Nobody ever connected with me. Finally, 9 hrs later, get another call, answer, it cuts me off appt is cancelled!

Doctor did not show up. If you signed up through United healthcare, there's no way to login the app itself. There is no way to reset the password or find out the username, because it requires a security question. And if you don't have a security question you have to call them. And if you call them, after they have you on hold, and hang up on you because they can't hear. After that experience two or three times, one-star review.

title: Surgery Doctor Crazy Adventure
description:
The lead doctor of surgery at the best hospital in the world needs your help to get ready treating her patients. Help her prep for surgery in this fun hospital themed game. 

Start by heading to the spa for some well-earned relaxation time! Give her a facial using only the best treatments and exfoliants. Moisturize her skin and protect her from harsh elements to preserve her skin health. When she‚Äôs all set, it‚Äôs time to go to the salon. 

Choose a lovely and professional hair style for the doctor. How about a bun or fun updo? Braids work great in a hospital environment too. Apply mascara, blush and lipstick to give her a fun makeover. She‚Äôll look beautiful as she helps people heal and get healthy! 

Then it‚Äôs time to pick out her outfit for the day. Dig through the surgery locker to find bright colored scrubs, official lab coats and comfy shoes. Pick an outfit that‚Äôs stylish and functional! When the doctor is dressed and prepped, it‚Äôs time to go help the patients in surgery! 

Product Features: 
- Three fun levels: Spa, Makeover and Dress Up
- Pick out cool doctor outfits for the surgeon
- Choose from lots of useful and neat medical equipment to finish the look

How to Play: 
- Tap to pick clothes, accessories and hair styles
- Swipe to apply makeup and spa treatments
- Tap to refresh and try a new look

title: Ambulance Doctor First Aid - Emergency Rescue Game
description:
Ambulance Doctor First Aid - Emergency Rescue Game is an extremely fun hospital simulation game.

Many people get injured in accidents every day. Ambulance and doctors are very important in every city. The faster and Ambulance reaches the injured people and takes them to the hospital, the faster doctors can save more lives of people. 

In this game, you need to speed the Ambulance fast to the injured people and then take them to hospital. Then as a doctor, you need to cure the injured patients and save their lives. Remember to carefully examine the patients for all possible injuries, be gentle with your medical tools when using on the patient ‚Äì they are already in pain. Be the best doctors and hospital of the town by providing excellent care to your patients and saving many lives!


Features:
-	Many different rescue missions to save people.
-	Choose from many different ambulance vehicles.
-	Work with real medical equipment.
-	Great sound effects and graphics to give real experience.


How to play:
-	Choose your favorite rescue mission.
-	Choose your favorite ambulance vehicle.
-	Follow the game instructions to use the medical equipment.


Have fun and Enjoy the game!

title: Healthgrades: Find doctors, manage your healthcare
description:
America‚Äôs No. 1 brand for finding a doctor and connecting with the right care is now the heart of your family‚Äôs healthcare organization.

The Healthgrades app makes managing your family‚Äôs healthcare quick, simple and convenient. Find doctors, book appointments, and even organize all of your family‚Äôs providers in one easy-to-reach place. 

* Find Quality Doctors and Dentists
Start your search with the type of doctor you need and your location, or look up a specific doctor‚Äôs name. From there, you can filter results by factors including insurance carriers accepted, gender, patient reviews, and how far you‚Äôre willing to travel. Each profile includes important details about a doctor‚Äôs experience, education, care philosophy, board certifications, and awards--all of which help you make confident decisions about your care and select the best doctor for you. 

* Easily Book and Prepare for Appointments
You can filter your search results to view doctors who accept online appointment scheduling, or tap to call right from a doctor‚Äôs profile. Before you head out the door for your appointment, click ‚ÄúGet Directions‚Äù on your doctor‚Äôs profile in the app to launch navigation from your phone. For quicker check-in at your doctor‚Äôs office, store a copy of your insurance card in the app to have it readily at hand. 

* Build Your Family‚Äôs Medical Care Teams
Once you‚Äôve found the right doctors--or want to keep track of the doctors you already have--you can build individual Care Teams for each member of your family. From your account, you can add a family member profile, including your spouse, children or parents for whom you manage care. No more tracking down doctor information from various places on your desktop--now you can find everything you need, for every family member, all in one easy family healthcare management tool.

* Read Patient Reviews and Rate Your Own Doctors
See what previous patients have said about their experiences with doctors to help decide which one is right for you. Star ratings reflect how likely patients are to recommend a doctor to a friend or family member. You can also see how patients rated office environment, staff friendliness, and wait times. After your appointment, open the app to rate and review your own doctor to help future patients like you make informed choices about their care.

UPDATE: Cleared cache and problem was solved. Quick reply from developer. Thanks! Fun little game and I love that you aren't limited by "energy" as to how much you can play. I can handle short ads before playing the levels. Was great until I can't load level 25. Says it can't show me an ad because I'm not connected to internet (even though I am) or I need to wait until ad downloads but that doesn't happen.

Really great story for a time management game.. not too hard, so really enjoyable. Unlike other similar game, this game doesnt put "energy" thing to play which is GREAT. I want to know more about what happen with allison and crew in the new hospital they are working.

The X-ray machine doesn't click into place, please fix the ultra sound; it doesn't allow you to see trough the skin. You can't pass without it working properly. We care about you enough to report bugs because we like the game so much. If we don't like it we just uninstall it without report. Thank you for your creativity you share with us.

title: Baby Doctor Office Clinic
description:
Baby Doctors Office Clinic is an app for little kids. Its a chance to be the doctor!

Take little baby junior girl or boy to see the doctor. 
Use a thermometer and check babys health. Give some medicine and pills to help recover baby. A fun filled doctor game that lets you check problems of other baby patients and fix them. 

From injecting medicine syringes to zapping germs in the body- you get to be the doctor and you decide how to give treatment.

Play in a wonderful app where you are the doctor with a cute nurse and you have to cure baby kids.
Get in the Doctors role and check the heartbeat with stethoscope, measure temperature using thermometer, diagnose hearts with the electrocardiogram, treat with syringes, eye drops, cough syrup and bandages.

Make sure baby never catches a disease or cold or a running nose on a flu. Treat your little patients and give them the hospital care they deserve. This app is the best experience to treat patients and give them the cure against the diseases they are suffering from.

You should pick a swathe and apply it on his injuries, however precisely in light of the fact that it damages and we don't need him to cry. Since he lost much blood we will manage an IV, and after that we will put a breathing apparatus all over, so he can inhale less demanding


Hospital is a fun place now, since it has become so easy now to treat your patients little doc with the help of nurse, injection, medicine & all the other doctor tools that will help you treat & cure your patients quickly and bring smile on their faces back.

title: Ear Doctor - Clean It Up Salon
description:
You‚Äôre an ear nurse and you love helping your clients stay healthy and curing them when they‚Äôre sick! 

Start your day by heading to the spa for a relaxing facial. Cleanse, exfoliate and tone your skin using all natural oils and cleansers. Have a refreshing mask and remove impurities to prep for a glowing moisturizer. Moisturize you skin with high-end lotions and you‚Äôll look fantastic! 

Then head to the salon for a fun makeover. Apply different makeup in various looks. Add eye shadow, eye liner and mascara to create a cute style. Add bronzer and highlight your gorgeous features. Finish with a dust of powder and a pouty lip. 

Choose the best nurse outfit to wear to work too! Try on lab coats, colorful scrubs and professional suits! Add comfortable shoes and medical tools like stethoscopes, doctor bags and x-rays. Then head to the hospital to take care of your patients. 

Finish by helping your patients clean their ears to stay healthy. Remove build up, flush ears and top off with ear treatment to ensure healthy ear drums and good hearing! Your work is so important to so many people! 
Product Features: 

- Choose from lots of different makeup, accessories and clothing
- Create your own medical style
- Help your patients in this fun medical game

How to Play: 
- Tap to choose items
- Swipe to use real medical tools
- Swipe to apply makeup and give yourself a makeover!

title: Emergency Injection Simulator
description:
Little girls patient got accidental infections on their bodies and want a physician doctor to help them to cure their diseases. One girl get a road accident on her bicycle. And have a serious injury on her leg. Doctor kids please inject her and give her first aid. Second girl sit in a garden, suddenly heavy rain started and she got a cold flu. Emergency ambulance needed to take her to hospital. Third girl eat a hot soap and her tongue has burn. She also got heartburn. Care her in a private clinic. Fourth girl slip on a road while walking on a road, lost her too much blood. Surgeon needed for blood draw to check her blood group. Nurse physician needed to  inject her a drip injection.

Features of Emergency Injection Simulator
 
*** Patient girl selection.
*** Emergency Injuries clinic and hospital.
*** Diarrhea, heartburn and tongue treatment of hot soap eaten girl.
*** Flu, and cold cough treatment using thermometer, stethoscope, injection, oxygen pump and syrup.
*** Bicycle accidental injured girl's leg treatment by surgeon using cutter, bandage, tetanus injection and medicine.
*** Road accident slip girl blood draw, blood group testing and drip injection with the help of on demand doctor.
*** All Girls wants first aid treatment from doctor kids.

Download now the emergency injection simulator and start enjoying the crazy doctor games.

title: My Hospital: Build. Farm. Heal
description:
Cure your way through the quirkiest and funniest diseases in My Hospital - the ultimate simulation game where you design, manage and maintain your very own medical centre! 

Create elixirs, farm and harvest your own medical plants and produce cures for hundreds of patients that need your help. It‚Äôs a world where Panacea rules and every treatment is available at your fingertips! 

‚óâ BUILD YOUR HOSPITAL

Construct and manage your own hospital. Build doctor‚Äôs offices, diagnostic rooms, the treatment centre and laboratories. Expand and upgrade your hospital and share it with friends! 

‚óâ CREATE UNIQUE CURES

Farm and harvest plants with healing properties, produce dozens of elixirs, and blend syrups to treat more than 80 funny diseases. Whether it‚Äôs a chilli throat condition, frozen hands or slimey lungs, you‚Äôll be sure to find the cure! Unlock new remedies, treatment rooms and new conditions with every level and complete fun challenges!

‚óâ DECORATE YOUR HOSPITAL

Customize each area of your health center to make your patients feel at home. You have tons of decorations to choose from and when you finally manage to make it look as pretty as a picture, show it off in front of your friends! 

‚óâ PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Connect with your Facebook account to access your friends‚Äô Hospitals around the world. Buy, sell cures and compete with other Hospital managers. Tell them about your achievements via Google Play Games and Facebook. 

Please note that My Hospital is free to download and play. However, some in-game items are available and can be purchased for real money. 

Like us on Facebook 
https://www.facebook.com/myhospital

Having problems? Got any suggestion? We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback! Reach us at: myhospital@kuuhubb.com

In this 1st 3D Doctor games you will treat heart patients suffering from cardiovascular disease. You are an experienced Heart Doctor in this hospital Simulator working in General Hospital ER Emergency Room. In Hospital ER Emergency Heart Surgery: Doctor Games, patients keep coming in to the ER Doctor Hospital & you‚Äôre the only emergency hospital doctor surgeon who can save patient from heart attack. Be prepared for hospital emergency situations where you have little time to save lives in 3D Hospital Games. Make crucial decisions, carry out life saving emergency doctor surgery & provide emergency room hospital care to your patients in the best surgery games & ER doctor simulator

Hospital ER Emergency Heart Surgery: Doctor Games is a new concept hospital games that you would surely love, especially if you love hospital simulator, medical games or addictive doctor simulator. Every city hospital games patient has a different injury & you will have to do heart surgery to make them heal in addictive ER surgery games unlike other operation games. A lot of patient come to doctor hospital emergency room in hospital ambulance to get treated. You are the best heart doctor surgeon in life saving hospital simulator. In this hospital doctor games, you have best team of hospital nurse & ER Emergency Hospital manager along with advanced hospital equipment e.g. MRI Scan, PET Scan & angioplasty machines to give best emergency room hospital care in 3D hospital games

title: HeyDoctor
description:
HeyDoctor is the easiest and most affordable way to get simple medical care, and now it's on iOS!

CONVENIENT AND HASSLE FREE
Waiting rooms suck. Get care from our expert doctors and medical team right now. We take care of many common conditions and visits take under 5 minutes.

SIMPLE, CLEAR PRICING
No insurance needed. Most of our visits are under $20 and come with a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

OUR MEDICAL SERVICES
-   Acne Diagnosis, Treatment, and Prevention
-   High Cholesterol (Lipid) Testing and Treatment
-   Start or Refill Birth Control
-   Urinary Tract Infection (UTI) Testing and Treatment
-   Vitamin D Screening and Treatment
-   Pre-Diabetes Screening and Referral
-   Hepatitis C Screening and Referral
-   Female Condom Prescription
-   Help Quitting Smoking
-   Find Out Your Blood Type

EASY PRESCRIPTION PICKUP AND REFILL
We can send the medicine to your local pharmacy, by mail, and in some cities even have it delivered to your door. 

AVAILABLE ACROSS THE UNITED STATES
We are currently available in Arizona, California, Connecticut, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Montana, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Virginia and Washington, but don‚Äôt worry the rest of the country is coming soon!

YOUR DOCTOR - AVAILABLE ANYTIME
You can chat with your doctor anytime and anywhere using secure messaging. Your data is all protected by HIPAA - confidential and secure.

ABOUT US
We are combining the latest evidence based medicine with cutting edge technology to create a fast, accessible, and affordable way to get care from a doctor anywhere, anytime.

Our medical care is provided by HeyDoctor, a California professional corporation. Made with love in Seattle and San Francisco.
