recentChanges:
Happy New Year and here's to a healthier year! To kick off the year, we've polished up some rough edges, ironed out kinks, squashed pesky critters and drank lots of coffee to bring you an even better HeyDoctor experience.

As always, stay healthy friends and do really try to make those New Year's resolutions last past the 4th week of January! Drop us a line at help@heydoctor.com if you have any questions or concerns.
comments: It really works! I was skeptical at first and thought it was too good to be true. I was fighting a bladder infection which I get frequently so I know how they feel. I simply paid a fee of $30 (prices vary) and put in my symptoms and then spoke with a Doctor. He prescribed me an antibiotic and within an hour I was able to go pick it up at my pharmacy! I also used GoodRX and only had to pay $15 for my antibiotics which would have been way more! I definitely recommend this app!

This is amazing. I had a bladder infection and needed antibiotics but with my work schedule and feeling yucky, I did not want to go to a walk in clinic. Hey Dictor came to the rescue, I registered in less than 2 min, paid 40$ with my HSA card, described my symptoms, and wrote a little explanation to the doctor. I didnt even have to call or video chat - within 3 hours I received a message that they sent an RX to my pharmacy. Amazing top notch service, I cannot thank you enough!

I was initially skeptical of using the app and putting in my card and everything. Worried it might be a scam. But I did try it and loved how quick and efficient the doctors were at answering my questions. They were helpful and quick sending the prescription I needed to the pharmacy of my choice. Nice to use this when I'm just too busy to get to my primary. And it's not very expensive

This is wonderful! It is very reasonably priced. The level of care combined with the pricing blows seeing a PCP or urgent care out of the water. I used Teledoc in the past for minor issues and I would definitely recommend this over Teledoc.

Absolutely amazing. I woke up on a Saturday morning at 4am with a UTI. I was dreading having to wait until my urgent care opened so I began looking up alternatives and Hey Doctor popped up. So glad I did! I filled out all the info and submitted my request around 5am and before 6am my prescription was sent. I was so relieved! Awesome service.

Enter the huge hospital with multiple rooms and explore every corner. A lot of people are feeling unwell, so you need to quickly help them feel better. Give them proper medicines, injections, check their heart rate, take x-rays, put bandages and lots more. It's just like a real hospital! üíâ

This isn't an ordinary hospital game, it's something totally unique! Play doctor games in this pretend hospital and have tons of fun.

Here's what you get in My Hospital Town - Free Doctor Games for Kids:
‚Ä¢ 5 different hospital rooms to explore including waiting room, recovery room and more.

This app is perfect to boost your child's creativity skills. It is a fun-filled interactive environment with endless fun and enjoyment for your kids in their own town. So go ahead and start playing now!

title: Pet Doctor. Animal Care Game
description:
Edujoy presents Doctor Pet Vet for children! This animal care game is a really entertaining educational game for children up to 8 years old with which you will learn to take care of your favorite animals.

OBJECTIVE
The objective is to take the veterinarian's role and to quickly heal the pets of your office from any disease of problem they may have. The game is easy: you have to follow the indicated steps and use the suitable tools.

The pets can have a cold, fever, allergy, earache, sore throat or stomach ache. You will also learn to heal wounds and scratches, broken nails and even to remove splinters, fleas and ticks from them.

Take care of domestic, farm and of zoo animals and assist them in their recovery to turn into the best vet of all!

HOW TO PLAY:
The process of healing your pets requires the following steps: 

To identify the illness or problem of every animal patient. To do this, you have to analyze the state of the pet by using different techniques such as the zoom, ultrasound scans, etc. 
To cleanse and to disinfect the zone that you want to heal.
To heal the animal employing different medications (syrups, ointments, creams‚Ä¶) tools (needles, tweezers, thermometer...) and materials (plasters, bandages, casts...), 
Finally, when you have cured the pet, you will be able to play with it by offering them toys and food.


Enjoy yourself while you take care of dogs, cats, monkeys, rabbits, squirrels and even koalas. Play and have fun at the same time!

ABOUT EDUJOY
All our games are created by professional educators and psychologists in order to provide pedagogical content, necessary for the intellectual development of babies and children.

Our mission is to help parents and teachers in their educational endeavors with young children, offering them top-quality learning applications.

We love creating educational and fun games for you. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to send us feedback or leave a comment.

comments: Dr Tracy Wilson was very helpful and quickly assessed the symptoms that my seventeen year old was experiencing. She confirmed what i was thinking and eased both our minds. The app itself has some problems and it was hard to tell if certain functions were operating properly.

This service was amazing! Super quick sign up like really quick. An NP takes initial info and respomses are immediate then doctor was chatting with me within 3 minutes or less and was very informative and offered me great advice regarding my issues and great steps to reach the goals of what i am trying to accomplish very easy and very quick best part was 7 day free trial to make sure you like the service before paying so why not try?! But i will certainly be permanentley joining for good! Best

This app is very helpful! Instead of making those scary trips to the ER and paying $200 for a bandaid, I highly recommend this app. Set up your regular doctor appointments but save the trip and text a doctor online with your concerns and they will be more than happy to assist and point you in the right direction. My experience with this app and the doctors I have spoken to on it has helped me a lot. I wish I could meet them in person and make them my regular doctors.
Couldn't ask question without having to give payment information. So much for the free trial.
Best app ever! Never been so pleased each answer always answered best outcome always happy with results couldnt ask for a better app! üòä
